13.content:
You'd rather not have gone near whoever was sleeping in the poorly lit room, so you continued looking around until your eyes had adjusted to the dark, giving you some idea where you are.

It looked like the room of a small child. A fairly big one too.

And looked it has a friend sleeping in too.

It seems that you avoided an disaster, what kind of situation would have happened if one of those children discover you? They could've mistaken you for some kind of toy, a little pet or a nasty pest to get rid of, or if they screamed the parents would've come in and assumed the worst. Still, you were in danger so long as you lingered here so you scanned the room for any means of escape.

The window was out because it was closed, and even if it wasn't you had no means to get there unless you somehow become spiderman and climb the walls, or grow a pair of wings..

However there was the door, it was, thankfully, open the kids hadn't properly closed the door which was a blessing in disguise.

You stealthily crept to the door and slipped through the small opening, successfully leaving the child's room. You were now on a open, dark lit corridor, there were windows that let the moonlight in, allowing you view of each side and the contents of it.

Whichever family owned this house, they were rich. The corridors themselves were big with lush carpets covering the floor and portraits on the walls, you couldn't quite distinguish the shapes but they looked colorful, one of those shapes looked like a quadruped dressed in a fancy suit.

Some of them were of a black cat, possibly a pet of theirs. You hoped that you wouldn't meet it on your long journey out of here.

Now, what to do?
13.title: Look for a way out

choices: You go through the main door.
131.content:
Seeing no one coming, you opted to go for the left side, hoping to see for an exit from there, hopefully. You walked onward to the left. You stayed close to the walls so in case of someone walking down this corridor You won't be that noticiable .

It took you minutes to reach the end of the corridors and what you saw were stairs, however, you didn't see it as a challenge as steps were close to each other.

"So this was the second floor." You murmured, while you don't have any problem going down, it's going to be a tiring process..

You grimaced on that though.

***

"Stairs... no more..." You gasped and panted after reaching down floor, this was an the hall and by god, sure is immense!

You could identify few more paintings and pictures in the walls of hall but due to the lack of light you couldn't see anything other than colorful mess. You see on the distance from what you can guess is the main doors of the house, as expected, it was closed but you could get outside by squeezing through the doors' underside. However, you see another door in the hall, one open and lights coming out of it, there were some noises too but it was too far away to hear properly...

You...
131.title: Go left side of the corridor.

132.content:
You went to the the right side of the hallway, and sticked closed to the the walls so in case someone walks around the propiety, this way you won't be spotted easily by any giant. But you didn't think one would walk now given the time.

Still better safe then sorry.

You reach on the end of the hall and unfortunately, it was also the dead end which means that the right way was the left side...

It's gonna be a pretty long walk now.

On the fascinating side, you were on front of another room, one that was also open just like the kids' room. It seemed that everyone around here doesn't lock their room.

This could be the parents bedroom or a total different room.

"Well, since I am here.." You move slowy to the crack in the door only to see.
132.title: Go Right Side of the Corridor.

choices: A room for storing food. It;s a but chilly in here
A library or study of sorts
1322.content: Then what the heck is it?
1322.title: It isn't a bedroom

133.content:
Footsteps echoed down the halls. You pressed yourself up close to the wall to remain unseen, as there was no other form of cover to hide behind. You could just make out a figure in the dim light, walking at an even pace up the corridor near your position. The shadows kept them hidden from view but a few odd flashes of pink were occasionally illuminated by the moonlight. The figure walked past you and entered the child's room for a few moments, then quietly shut the door and moved on. You cautiously followed at a distance, reasoning that if anyone would know the way out of here it would be the residents of the household. The figure continued to advance until it reaches a door on the right side of the corridor, opened the door, and vanishes inside. First making sure the coast is clear, you sprinted up to a crack beaming with light and peered inside. The room was well lit, with candles adorning the walls and a smoldering fireplace lending heat. A bright pink... thing was sitting at a large desk, busily scribbling on something with a quill dipped in ink. The features looked vaguely equine, with a short little muzzle and two great furry ears crowning its head. Its focus seemed entirely on what it had on the desk, making little noises every now and then and then writing some more.

Whatever it is it seems too focused on what it's doing to notice you
Maybe now is your chance to sneak up close to get a better look?
133.title: You heard something approaching, Hide!

1331.content:
Just what was that thing? you pondered while you observed from your hiding spot Your curiosty burned, guiding your feet into the room in spite of the possible danger. You quietly moved around, making sure to keep just out of sight of its vision, whatever it was, it seemed to be solely occupied with writing.

As you got close, you could actually see more details, it was definitely equine in nature and pink furred and was... murmuring something. They weren't gibberish ,but words, born out of a language you couldn't recognize, the sound of the voice was female sounding, which means that this giant... horse, pony? thing was female... theoretically speaking.

Soon your sly movement brought you it's... her tail which reached the floor, with each individual strand of hair being big enough to be a rope.

Do you dare to climb it?
1331.title: Enter the room

13311.content:
The purple rope-like hairs dangle in front of your face, inviting you to grab hold. Even though this is probably not the time or place to take risks you find it impossible to resist. Grabbing a clump of hair you haul yourself upwards, mindful of your grip and the swaying motion of the horse's tail. You stop occasionally to catch your breath and rest, then continue upwards in short bursts/ Soon you near the part where the tail meets the body, the dock you think it's called, then stop. breathing hard. You are seriously out of shape. Why did you even come up here?
Climbing all the way to the top of the head's out of the question.
You're too tired to climb back down.
Look's like your only option is to stay here and wait until she gets up.
13311.title: Yes.

133111.content:
You still held pretty tightly the hair but took time to rest and breath easy, the Tail didn't move this time which you were quite thankful for. Seriously what bring you to this point? Was this excitement? The thrill of doing something so bold and... stupid?

On insight, this... mare will probarbly the only form of transport you have, you can only hope that she moves more around the household so you can make some sort of mental map and finally see for an exit.

That or the mare will simply go to her room and sleep. It was an risk, an gamble but one that could mean anything if you prove to be correct.

You heard some grumbling from above and the sound of something being moved.

This is it! Did the mare get off the seat
133111.title: Rest

choices: Wait for her to move again
1331112.content:
She begins to squirm in her seat, obviously uncomfortable about something. Lifting her rump into the air she adjusts her position to where her tail is now pinned underneath her butt. You feel pressed underneath her soft fur, with the tail acting as a buffer between her body and your own. It's difficult to move. Miraculously you still have air to breathe but you aren't sure how long that's going to last.
Waiting for her to move again or wriggling like mad seem like your best options to get out of this situation.
1331112.title: No, she simply adjusted herself.

13311122.content:
You thought initially on moving and struggle but that seems like a terrible idea, she could you notice you which wasn't the best choice, what kind of reaction she'll get if she discover you, on her derriere not less? Beside, if you get to struggle, your supply of oxigen wouldn't last.

So you wait... and wait..

Until you heard shuffling from above and objects being placed somewhere, did she finally get off the chair?
13311122.title: Wait for her to move again

133111221.content:
As if it was a mercy came from the very heaven, the mare started to move again and this time, She begins to get off the chair letting you room to breath easy again, you hear something, like a book closing and she began to move, her tail and finally you, free from the crushing weight of her plushy plot.

Soon she was back to her fee- hooves and began to walk out of the room while grumbling, her purple tail moves as she walks. Did you manage to stay on her tail despite the frenetic moves?
133111221.title: Yes.

choices: You (somehow) climb the plot while she's moving
1331112211.content:
The movement causes the tail causes to fail back down, bringing you with it! The air rushes out of your lungs as you collide with her posterior, jarring you loose and making you fall onto her plot. You raised yourself onto your hands and knees, dazed from the impact. The soft appearance of her butt belied a core of firm muscle under a wrapper of fat. You did a quick check of yourself and found nothing broken, though you would definitely feel it in the morning. Your new location was midway up her plot, uncomfortably close to the swell of where her genitals would be. Attempting to move from your location brought on a sharp gasp from somewhere in front.
<Huh, what was that? Is somepony there?>
You hope that was only a coincidence and she didn't feel you back there, otherwise getting away was going to be a lot harder. Oh, please don't let her feel you and then find you and then stomp on you and squish you like a bug.
After a short pause she began to move again, forcing you to cling close to her fur to avoid slipping down.

What happens next?
1331112211.title: Yes, but...

13311122112.content: "Shit!" The sudden movement, made you slip, you managed to hold but barely, your grip was becoming less and less stable as you were slipping further. You hadn't enough energy to hold on however there is one way to get out of this out of trouble if you..
13311122112.title: Your grip begins to fail

133111221123.content:
You have no choice, you have to jump. Using the last of your strength you hurled yourself at the nearest safe place you could find, which, unfortunate, happened to be right on her nether lips. You heard a wet smack as you
impacted the moist sticky flesh and slid down very close to her clitoral hood.

That sudden exertion left you feeling tired and sore suddenly and you weren't feeling up to moving much more. If the mare found you here now there was no way you could run away or fight back
133111221123.title: Jump to the privates.

choices: Rush to her Room and investigate.
shake her flanks in attempt to remove you.
1331112211231.content:
To make matters worse, you felt the fleshy walls tensed as the movement ceased, you heard a sharp but small gasp.

<What in the world..> You heard her talking, this only confirm one thing.

She felt you and she began to.
1331112211231.title: She felt you

13311122112311.content:
The walls shook as the mare quickened the pace of her walking to wherever it was she was going. You head a door close behind you and saw your resting place in full detail as she backed up towards a full length mirror.
An enormous purple hoof reached directly for you, scraping you off the clitoris and depositing you onto the soft frog.
The hoof carried you back around to the mare's face who had a look of ____
13311122112311.title: Rush to her Room and investigate.

133111221123111.content:
Her eyes have a concern in there, you were hoping that it for you but you got reminded that it might be concerned on her own body.

<Oh goodness! Are you alright?> Her voice was directed to you but you couldn't understand it, it sounded like a question. Maybe she is asking you why you were in her privates, you tried to shake your head but in soon, you lost conscionuess..

***

After an undeterminate amount of time, you woke up, a bit dizzy but better now, where you are?
133111221123111.title: Concern

choices: You wake up but deeper into her.
1331112211233.content:
As much you wanted to give up, you simply couldn't, either you fall or get inside which seemed to be the only option unless you wanted to become Human salsa, you summoned the last remaining strength you have and climbed your way inside to her velvety depth, her soft, spongy flesh felt warm and welcoming.

You were kind of surprised and grateful that she didn't felt you or at least, you think that she is ignoring you.

You rested halfway inside and already feeling the flesh wrapping around you like a spongy blanket, soon, you were basked on its warm as your eyes felt heavy.

You wake later...
1331112211233.title: Go inside

choices: She goes to her bedroom, and you crawl into bed with her
She heads to the kitchen to make a midnight snack
13312.content:
If the mare were to see you watching her there was no telling what might happen, whether she would want to help you or squish you or even see you as a source of food..
Better to hang back in the shadows and continue to observe just out of her line of sight.
So, you did just that, moving into a corner so you could continue to watch her work, unseen.
Her attention seemed solely focused upon the paper in front of her, completely ignoring everything else around her.
It was like she was in her own little world.
The little ums and ahhs she made were quite cute, actually, and if it weren't for the fact that you had so little information on the equine creature and try to make friends with her.
The mare looked down at her paper one more time, before she yawned and the chair creaked as she leaned back, limbs crackling as she stretched them out.
She returned the quill to the inkwell and pushed the chair out, getting back on her four hooves and started heading towards the door.
You flattened yourself against the wall so that she wouldn't see you, but it didn't seem like she was even aware you existed.
Your mind was in a turmoil in deciding if you should follow her, until you realized that this place was huge and you might need her help getting out of here.
So, reluctantly, you followed in the mare's hoofsteps, quickly rushing under the door before she could close it completely.
13312.title: No.

choices: To another open room in the corridor.
You landed into something even more dark and wet.
135.content:
Before moving get you felt a strong current of air staggering you from where you're, it was a surprise since the windows of the corridors were closed.. until, you saw one that was open, its curtains moved wildy due to the current entering.

Unfortunately for you, your weight was also reduced with you that the air managed to lift from the ground. You wanted to scream in peril but you were too shocked to do so.

The winds take to you..
135.title: You feel a strong air current lift you.

choices: A pile of hay inside a barn
In the fountain, in the middle of the town.
Into a another but bigger and impressive mansion.. above a crystal tree?
1351.content:
The gust of winds carries you through the large corridors in incredible speed, you were pretty scare on the high speed it takes you through the household and toward another open window that kept the current alive.

Soon you were out of the house and taken high above in mere minutes, this time you did scream.

However as you were seemingly "flying" unwilling, you see the shrinking household below you and around it, the illuminated streets of a town. The town looks 'old' yet not, seemly medieval even but looks can be deceiving and from here you can almost think that it looked pretty beautiful.

At least you were outside but it revealed just one thing, you don't recognize the town at all.

Unfortunately, the winds were growing weaker and weaker as you approaching dangerously to the ground of the town.

You soon fell to...
1351.title: Outside!

13511.content:
You fell, hard, on a pile hay which thankfully halted your fall. You sighs in relief but then cought, your throat was sore and your body was drenched in cold sweat.

The adrenaline was starting to dissipate from your system as a wave tiredness wash over you. Looking around your surroundings, you see you were in a barn, you can make up some more hay and farm tools scattered around.

You wanted to continue exploring but your body was too tired.
13511.title: A pile of hay inside a barn

135111.content:
While you were tired you weren't that tired.

Instead, you get off the pile of hay and walked to the open doors until you reached outside, on front of you were apple trees illuminated by the moonlight, they were so enormous that could be considered skyscrapers You knew that the house of the people must be nearby, perhaps next to this barn. alternatively, you could go into the orchard, you thought you saw an tree house nearby which you could use as a refuge... assuming you'll get there.

Decided, you..
135111.title: Get up and continue exploring.

1351111.content:
You decided to wander and search for the house, You don't want to get lost into the darkness of the orchard just to get into an empty treehouse on a tree that won't be possible to climb on, much less on your correct state.

You went around the barn, surrounding it until you reach to its side, you saw a house which was actually behind it, you went there but also noticed a road, said road go to a pair of doors, you could see throught its bars the town, looked pretty far.

You were already here, You didn't wanted to get unnecesarely tired by going into a long trip into the town.. besides of being really close for a much better refuge.

You squizzed yourself through the door's undeside and entered the house proper, You could explore or search for a small hideout to rest until morning and then you can look for the owners of this farm to help you out.
1351111.title: Farmers House

13511112.content:
You were too tired to continue exploring besides, it was too dark to properly see in the dark. While looking around for a better hiding place, you see a hole in the wall. You rush to it and enter into the pitch black and dusty area, hoping that there aren't any critters already lurking inside it.

You lay down on the cold floor next to the entrance and yawned, you had a very eventful night, hopefully, tomorrow will be better.
13511112.title: Hideout.

135111122.content:
Just before you could get time to sleep, you felt and heard sounds that seemly belongs to people coming downstairs, curious you came out of your hole and peered outside. what you saw shocked you.

Coming downstairs was an equine-like creature, you couldn't simply believe your eyes unless you're dreaming already and you don't feel like dreaming right now.

though it was hard to see, the fur color of the gigantic creature was...
135111122.title: You heard something.

choices: You felt a strong gust of wind lift you, again..
1351111221.content:
You saw a gigantic orange equine creature coming downstairs and onto the kitchen, you heard it sigh and mutter which surprised you, it talked and in a feminine tone, no less, and seeing the lack of... tool and more like udders or teats in the lower side.

A Mare, an Orange mare with blond hair and a cowboy hat, she looked pretty cute despite being an Equine, in fact, she looked more that she belonged to a cartoon.

She was going to your direction it seems which made you retreat back to the crack in the wall...

You...
1351111221.title: Orange

choices: Fly right into the orange pony's mouth
Collide with a stetson cowboy hat
Ricocheted you off the wall and into a cereal bowl
13511112213.content:
Suddenly you felt a strong gust of wind at your back, again, that picked you up off your feet.
You flailed around in in desperation kicking and screaming as some unseen force bound and determined to push the plot forward hurled you through the air. The angle of your trajectory caused you to
13511112213.title: Dastardly recurring plot contrivance

135111122131.content:
You were being hurled to the equine's yawning mouth and before you could eevn scream it was too late, passed into the closing mouth and impacted onto the soft tongue.

The mouth closes, leaving you in darkness and the large, slimy tongue that began to move around, pinning you at the fleshy roof and coating you with saliva. The entire place reeked of apple, the breath was hot, heavy and humid.

Soon the tongue moved making you roll over under its undulating and chaotic movement, bathing you more with saliva, you try to get a hold but couldn't as the orga was too slimy to grab

"Hmmmm" You heard a loud female voice coming from the throat and all around you. It -She was tasting you!

You hope the nightmare would end...

Then..
135111122131.title: Fly right into the orange pony's mouth

choices: You eventually fell onto the equine's back
You manage to hold on somehow.
The Equine stop and inspect the hat
135111122132.content:
You collide with a Stetson cowboy hat, said hat orange Equine was wearing on her head luckily it wasn't a hard crash and landed on the flat surface of the hat

Unfortunately, this doesn't mean that the ride was smooth as the Equine walked and move her head constantly and the fabric of the stetson was really hard to grasp

You..
135111122132.title: Collide with a stetson cowboy hat

choices: You scramble out of the way in time
135111122133.content:
"Ooof!" You felt the wind get knocked out of you as you collided with a wall and the force of your momentum sent you flying backwards into a bowl full of cold milk.
You burst up to the surface, shivering and gasping for air when you notice something floating by, a spongy looking donut shape, which you grab a hold of and cling to tightly. The aroma of it seemed rather familiar to you, but you couldn't quite put your finger on it. Cinnamon... and a hint of apple flavoring.
Wait a minute. Are these... Applejacks?
Your train of thought took a nosedive off a cliff, however when you noticed a giant silvery thing that looked suspiciously like a spoon dip below the whitish liquid.
You looked around frantically for where it might of went, then realized with dread that it was right beneath you as your small pool of milk began to rise in the air, right towards a waiting, hungry yellow mouth.
135111122133.title: Ricocheted you off the wall and into a cereal bowl

1351111222.content:
Coming downstairs was a giant of a Red Equine with colorful dark blond mane and tail. It was bulky, having a muscular frame and what was dangling between its hind legs it was obviously a male, a stallion. He yawned and muttered something you couldn't understand, the fact that he talked at all took you by surprise.

Again, you don't feel like dreaming which means that this was actually real.

The Stallion went to the kitchen it seems. completely unaware of your presence. What do you do?
1351111222.title: Red

1351112.content:
Deciding the risk was worth it, you veered away from the house and trekked across the yard and into the orchard, constantly on the lookout for any dangerous critters that would chase you. Occasionally you would meet a simple slope you would have to crest and slide down the other side. Crickets added their music to the night air, breaking the otherwise still atmosphere. The trees created a beautiful and surreal backdrop, like you were walking in an enchanted forest populated by fairy creatures, or man eating wolves... Okay, why did your mind immediately go there? You were having such a good time and now you made yourself on edge. You tried to calm yourself while remaining vigilant but the thought managed to stick in your mind.

You shivered as a gust of wind blew over your tiny from. Was it always this cold or were you so preoccupied by your walking you didn't notice? A low buzzing sound sounded off somewhere in the distance. Seems like the wind might've disturbed a hive of bees. You breathed a bug sigh of relief when you spotted the tree house perched on a lone tree sitting out in the clearing. Just as you were about to begin the final steps toward your destination, a loud *crunch* alerted you to a presence behind you. Instead of doing the smart thing by hauling ass towards the structure without looking back you instead whirled on the noise.

Four black pillars rose from the darkness, extending upwards like an elongated shadow to to meet a greater mass. Attached to mass was the most terrifying thing you had ever seen, a horrifying visage made up of razor sharp teeth and bio-luminescent green eyes emerged from the darkness, and it was looking right at you!
Your legs refused to work, so enthralled were you by the black horror that you were paralyzed with fear.
The fanged mouth slowly cracked open, a droplet of thick spittle drooping out as she licked her lips in anticipation, a predatory look in her eyes. Just as you were about ready to be devoured however, the creature closed it's mouth and turned away.
<Too small> it muttered, and then began walking off in a different direction. You released the breath you'd been holding. What was that all about? Was it not hungry? You'd like to think of yourself as someone pretty tasty.

You looked back at the treehouse. You have a strong feeling that you should follow the creature, but that may have just been a fluke and you won't be so lucky next time.
1351112.title: A close encounter of the creepy kind

choices: Look for a place to sleep.
One of the bundles stirs and move.
13511122.content:
Despite the feeling to follow that creature you made a second guess, what were you thinking? It could've eaten you! No, you shake your head and decided to run away from the clearing immediately, away from place and toward the Treehouse. It has a ramp so there wasn't needed to climb the tree itself and you rushed in faster that your legs could carry you.

By the time you arrived to the Treehouse's inside, you were panting out of exhaustion but you were still full on adrenaline and you couldn't stop now. The creature could return if it change her opinion.

It was quite hard to make out the shapes within the darkness but you could make up an chalkboard, a table few chairs. The entire place was quite roomy for a treehouse. You also notice three huge bundles clustered together and seems... almost like breathing...?

Still, what do you do now?
13511122.title: Head on towards the treehouse

135112.content:
You didn't had the enough strength and fortitude to continue, the adrenaline on your system was subsiding as your eyes grow heavy by the second.

You only hope that you won't be found here..

***

You heard the sounds of birds announcing the morning, as light fills your eyelids. Opening your eyes, you see the sunlight coming through the window. Hearing the sounds of activity and voices far away from you, you can assume that whoever owns the farm, were up as well.

You can also help but hear the sound of clopping as well. Maybe they do held animals here.

You climb down the pile of hay and walked around the giant barn, it wasn't much to see other than more hay and some farm tools, You hear the sound of clopping closing by, it could be one of the horses the people own coming adn themselves since you hear voice as well. You could hide on the hay and wait until they passes or risk it and going out the open and call for help.
135112.title: Too tired, sleep.

1351121.content:
A person such as yourself would be beneath notice, but there was still the risk of being stepped on, so you continue to hide. The clopping gets louder the longer time goes and you ca hear the voices growing uncomfortably close. You go stock still, hoping that whoever's out there will leave you alone so you can escape. They don't leave however, in fact they get so close that you feel them right next to you.

<"I'm so happy that you were able to lend us of some of your hay, Applejack. We just ran out and you know how fussy Angel gets when he's hungry.">
<"Aw shucks Fluttershy, don't mention it. Ah live fer helpin' out a good friend in need, plus ah never got the chance to repay ya for delivering Bessie's calf last winter. Take as much as ya need, we got plenty.">
<"Oh goodness! I guess I'll have to take you up on that offer.">
<"Here, let me just get ya a crate and I'll pitch this fer ya.">

Silence comes for a few moments, giving you hope, which is quickly dashed when the voices return, this time it sounds like one of them is being weighed down by something heavy.

<Ungh uhhhh unnngh. Ufff.>
You hear a heavy thud.
There. Ah'll just pitch this bale and then ya can go on yer way. Ah also threw in some fresh apples fer later.>
<Oh thank you Applejack! You really are too kind..>
<Don't mention it. All right, here we go!>
You hear grunts of exertion, punctuated by a sudden quick movement beneath you.
You screech in terror as you feel yourself lifted up before being hurled into a dark space.
A square hole of light above you is quickly closed up by a shadowy shape, leaving you in complete darkness.
1351121.title: Decide to wait and hide.

1351122.content:
You didn't wanted to wait any longer, you wanted their help as soon as possible, you went through the door and was ready to shout on the direction of the voices.

*STOMP*

*STOMP*

*STOMP*


You dodge the gigantic furred column that stomped the ground, you dodge the others that followed jumping around like a maniac until..
1351122.title: Risk it and go out.

13511222.content:
When you jump you were caught and trapped into something, like.. ropes? well, it looks like ropes all clustered together and were also colorful. The texture felt softer than ropes, not, it was something else, looking around you notices that those were long and attaching to the... behind of an equine...

This was a Tail... A very long Tail that reached the floor

The Tail was..
13511222.title: Caught by.. a Tail..

13512.content:
You continue falling until you fell into a fountain's waters. Thankfully, it wasn't the hard floor and the water took most of the fall, leaving you relatively unharmed.

You move upward to take air, you were lucky that you knew how to swim, otherwise you were pretty boned here. Lucky for you, the water levels were pretty high, enough to get off and move away.

***

It took you ten long minutes to get out of the fountain, the structure was pretty high and you only got down by climbing down from a nearby bush that grew next to it.

Now soaked, cold and pretty much lost, you looked around your surroundings.

You considered you options..

You need somewhere to rest, a refuge to past the night and dry your clothes and to do so, you need to get inside one of the town's building, which was pretty much ironic since your first objective was to get out of the giant kids' house and you were given that wish in the form of a whirlwind.

Now you were to find one to enter and find a warm place to sleep.

You could go exploring, from the path you're in, you saw some buildings that cought your attentions for their.. striking looks. Alternatively, you simply wait here, hidden in bush and sleep until next day. You were clearly tired but you'll risk on getting cold..
13512.title: In the fountain, in the middle of the town.

135122.content:
You were too tired to continue, just by the climbing down alone had worn out your arms and legs, you clothes feel heavy because of the water and felt really cold.

You felt the adrenaline in your body subside and. in exchange, began to feel the aching pain of.. well, everything in your body, from the fall of the pool, your muscles on the arms and legs.

In other words, you were pretty beat up and cannot continue any further.

Using the last vestiges of your energy, you moved where there were a concentration of leaves and grass in the bush/mini-forest, luckily there aren't any insects around which was a good news. You make a makeshift bed using some leaves and have another as a sheet, then you took your drenched clothes and underwear off and place it on another leaf.

You sighs and went to your 'bed'.

Your only hope that this was a crazy dream.
135122.title: Sleep.

1351221.content:
You wake up from your dreamless sleep, feeling a bit better however what actually wake you from was the bustling sound of activity all around you and more importantly the sounds of horse clopping but more louder and almost on everywhere, you also hear chatting but you didn't understood it, were there many people talking that it turned into gibberish or it was on another language you weren't familiar with.

Getting up from your makeshift bed, you looked where your clothes are and frowned when you saw them still slightly wet and cold.

Unfortunately, it was also the only ones you came with so you put them on but shuddered on the cold fabric and wet areas and-

"AACHOO!" You sneezed.

Great, I have a cold now.. You though and sniffed.

You ventured outward of your green temporary haven to see the Town itself but what you saw actually stunned you.

Horses, Giant, Colorful, Cartoonish-Esque Equines roamed the streets, walking, chatting or even selling and pulling carts, They looked... Cute, actually. With big round eyes and short muzzle, however you saw some others that had more bigger muzzle and muscle mass but what caught more of your attention is that some had wings or horns!

They also had tattoos or symbols on their flanks, each one unique for each horse.

This town was populated by Horse straight out of a little girl's fantasy

Were you still dreaming or hallucinating-?

*STOMP*

"EEK!"

You stagger back when seeing one gigantic furred leg suddenly stomping the ground front on of you, one of the giant horse things just passed by and you were almost squashed by it. You was basically lucky you didn't take any further steps or you'll be dead on the spot. This was the most terror indulcing thing you were experienced, This wasn't a dream, the stomp, the vibration, it all felt very real..

You retreated back to your green bushy refuge, pondering what to do.

For all fear you were feeling, you couldn't stay here forever, you need to get out for food and drink, something you currently lack, but moving into the town was suicidal move as proved just early. There was idea, though, some of the Equines' tail were very long and almost touched the ground, You could hitch a ride by holding onto the tail and let one of the locals take you somewhere without their notice.

You take a deep breath and prayed, you weren't very religious person but this made you feel a bit better and considering your situation, you might start believing now, because you'll need a Divine Intervention for this crazy stunt to work.

"Here it goes..."

And without much fanfare, you sprint into the open, running into one particular horse, the one that almost squashed you, it was moving fast or it was because of your size? you couldn't tell but you were nearing to its tail little by little but you were tiring out pretty fast, you were never athletic, mostly average at best but you were now ill and the wet clothes' added weight. it feel you weren't going to make it.

but did you?

"I'm sorry Pinkie, I'd love to but I really must get home and freshen up. I want to look my best fro the occasion. Save one for me?" Rarity said.

You don't have to stop what you're doing on my account. It'll just be so much sweeter when we share with everypony at the party. I'll put some away for you too to take home later."

At this Rarity gave a relieved smile. "Oh, thank you Pinkie! I know I can always depend on you. I won't be but a moment. If he gets there before I do, stall him."

Pinkie stood up straight, then swing her hoof wide into a snappy salute. "Yes, ma'am. I won't let you down Ma'am," before giggling again and rushing off in a pink blur.

135122111212.content:
Somehow, you had been able to hold your grip despite the tail slapping you against her wide furry behind with each and every step she took, though the near constant battering was like a soft hell on your poor tiny fragile body.
At least the smell was pleasant: Whatever fancy perfume wore or shampoo this mare had bathed with left a tingling sensation in your nostrils. Jasmine or Lilac, you think.
The mare spoke, her voice taking on a surprised tone before being joined by two others.
One was that of a mature female and the other sounded younger and higher pitched, most likely an adolescent.
As the three talked the tail began to swish and twitch from side to side, making it increasingly hard to keep your grip. and the mare's posterior muscles tightened up against her skin like a drum.
Your lower lip involuntarily migrated to in between your teeth and your brow broke out in a cool sweat.
Damn son, that booty was too much for you.
So distracted were you by the glorious movement of the mare's divine posterior that you didn't even notice that your grip was loosening.
You slowly began to slide down the silky strands until you dropped off altogether, landing face down on the ground in a cloud of dust.

You pushed yourself to your knees and the ground began to shake as the mare stepped forward, continuing to converse with the other ponies completely ignorant of you. They were all seated in fancy looking wooden chairs around a round table, chatting among themselves merrily before your mare entered the scene..
The ground shook with every step she took as the mare (You're going to have to give her a nickname or something at this point) moved forward and reached up to the table, giving you another great view of her plot and now exposed vulva, which pushed open slightly as her body flexed showing just a hint of pink.
Unnnnnf.
The lizard part of your brain was ripping away at your self control and switching all your settings to "dick" mode.
You began to fantasize about the shapely curvature of her equine booty while rubbing your legs together, thinking about how lovely she would look in some black lingerie wrapped around her hips, or how her figure could be improved upon even more if she was filled with...

No.
You shook your head vigorously, trying to get all these nasty thoughts out of your head. You were the one in control, not your penis. Now was not the time to get distracted, even if it was for that sweet sweet pony poon, and yet... it looked so enticing, like you were meant to be in there.
A fogginess pervaded your senses, heavily affecting your judgement and driving you to distraction.
You... you needed to get away from there before you did something you regret that might you killed.
You...

The interior is cozy and nicely furnished, with small knickknacks adorning the walls, multiple wooden cabinets, and a plush couch taking up the center of the room. 135122112112321.title: Take Him.

1351221121123211.content:
A little while later...

Twilight Sparkle stood in front of the mirror portal waiting for Sunset to come through. Her reply to Twilight's letter had been one of great interest in taking care of a tiny human being, and that she would be coming through to take him ASAP.

Twilight had tucked said human into a glass jar, a place that he had quickly made his displeasure known about. She felt sorry for the little guy, but she really had nothing else on hoof to hold him in. At least he could see what was happening in there.

Sunset had said that she was going to be running a little late, but Twilight still kept looking nervously as the clock all the same. Where was she? She should've been here by now. Twilight had the opened the portal 30 minutes ago and there was still no sign of Sunset.

Her fears were allayed as the portal flashed and a light orange pony with red and yellow hair stepped out of it.
"Phew, I think I finally got the hang of it. Hey Twilight, what's u--"

Twilight rushed up to Sunset and hugged her tightly before she could finish. "I'm so glad to see you Sunset. You don't come to visit often enough."

"Well I've been pretty busy," the flustered mare replied, scratching the back of her head with a hoof.. "In fact the reason why I was so late is because we just had a run-in with a baddie that we had to take care of. No big deal, it was nothing we couldn't handle. Anyway, wasn't there something you wanted to talk to me about?"

"OH! Yes. Fluttershy and Pinkie Pie found this little guy wandering the streets of Ponyville and I have no idea how he got there," she said while holding up the glass jar holding the human in question. "He's really small so he's going to need a caretaker until I can figure out how to reverse this. I feel like he'd be a lot more comfortable among his own kind so I'm going to leave him in your hands until then."

Sunset took the jar in her own magic and looked down at the little man in awe. "Do you have any idea how this might have happened?" she asked.

Twilight shook her head. "Nope, and trying to piece this together is going to be a real challenge."

"Do you need any help?" Sunset asked with concern.

Twilight took a moment to think before replying.
"No... I think we can handle it. No need to worry, Sunset, we'll figure it out somehow."

"Oh, well ok then. I guess I'll just go..." Just as Sunset turned to leave, Twilight cried 'Wait, I've got an idea!"

Sunset looked back at her confused while Twilight took the jar. "Let me just do this and...." A violet purple flash illuminated the container before fading. "Perfect, now he'll be sure to keep his shape upon stepping through the portal. Wouldn't want to risk him turning into a tiny pony while he's over there."

"Huh, I didn't know you could do that," Sunset murmured before resuming her walk towards the swirling gate.

"Be sure to write me if anything comes up," Twilight called.

Sunset smiled at her before stepping through the portal and into a new world.

choices: Something more enter the stomach, more food!
135311122.content:
You heard a rumble but it wasn't from the digestive organ around you but in yourself, coming from your own stomach, you were hungry. What was the last time ate something? Then again this adrenaline indulced 'adventure' was starting to get effect on you.

You notices some, more large chunk of chewed and swallowed food that wasn't broken down by the acid yet. We're you really going to do this? It seems so, there was not other way as you felt a spang of hunger just by staring it.

You swim to it...
135311122.title: You're ravenously hungry

1353111222.content:
Your attention is drawn upwards as a quiet gulping sound can be heard. The esophageal sphincter opens up and more food starts raining down, this time large bits of chocolate chip cookie to go with the milk from earlier. The sweets gather in big piles floating on top of the lake of acid. Eagerly you breaststroke over to the one nearest you and greedily attack the delicious chocolate delight, stuffing your face and swallowing like you hadn't eaten anything in days. Which in all fairness, you probably haven't. Now sated, you allow yourself to turn over and float on your back. Who knew that an organ designed to digest food would be a place of safety and comfort for you.
You almost don't want to leave.
Your lids feel heavy, the wonderful feeling of a full stomach causing you to drowse.
Before long you just can't keep your eyes open and drift off into a peaceful slumber.
1353111222.title: Cookie chunks to go with the milk

choices: There was a Equine-like creature waiting for you.
13531112221.content:
You let youself enter into a deep slumber, the soothing sounds of heartbeats made it more easier, your dreams began to take form of an home, your home.. you began to feel a bit nostalgic. It wasn't much but it was yours, you explore around it, the hall, your room, the guest room, the kitchen. Everything was where you remember..

Is this really a dream or you just imagine everything before? You heard something coming from the backyard, naturally you went to the back door to investigate but upon opening it you saw...
13531112221.title: Sleep

135311122211.content:
You went to the backyard only to be replaced from what looks like to be a swimming pool on its place. It was odd.. you never remember having a pool on your house before, sure there were plans for it but that was before things got harder for you in the economic sense.

Still...

It's a swimming pool..

Be it a dream or not, you gotta try it.

"Oh well.. Banzai!" *SPLASH*

You jumped into the waters to enjoy yourself and surprisely, the water was warm, almost like a Jacuzzi which made things even more enjoyable, you floated on the water to relax until you heard something right next to you..it sounds like a current of water.

Upon "opening" your eyes to see what was happening you see that you weren't in your house or even swimming pool anymore but in a vast ocean.. with you drifting dangerously to a massive maelstrom, you swim to the opposite direction but to not avail were too strong and...

You woke up.

With a gasp, you looked around and to your oddly enough, relief, you were still inside the stomach.. until you notice that you were drifting toward a whirlpool just like in the dream. You again try to swim in the opposite direction but the current were too strong..

You really hope that you'll survive on this..
135311122211.title: A wet nightmare.

135311122212.content:
Opening the door you see what you kinda expected, a green empty space with a tree on the corner and flowers growing around it.as well a midnight blue horse-like creature observing you.

Nothing here seems out of the ordinar-
Wait...
You do a double take.

<What are you?>
It takes you a moment to realize that there were words coming out of her mouth.
It --er, she speaks in a tongue that is completely foreign to you. The creature in question is tall and regal, outmatching your own height by a foot or so, with a long spiraled horn splitting the middle of her forehead and two majestic wings folded on her back, her mane and tail were... surreal, almost ethereal with visible stars blinking in and out in it, almost like she held the very night sky in her hair.

Her facial features were quite frankly adorable, with big round expressive eyes and a cut little muzzle. Her expression hardens.

<We asked, what manner of creature are you?!>
The blue horse was getting agitated now.
She steps forward, lowering her horn to an offensive stance.
You nervously back up, throwing your hands up in defense.
"Whoa, hey now! I don't know what you're trying to say!"

The equine creature stops her advance, eyes widening slightly.

<Do you not speak the common tongue?> She narrows her eyes and looks you up and down. With a firm look, her horn seems to glow in a light bluish glow, soon the same glow surrounds you for a few minutes before few minutes later.

You pat yourself down hastily, trying to suss out what just happened.

"What you did you do to me?"

The Equine...
135311122212.title: There was a Equine-like creature waiting for you.

1353111222121.content:
<Now we can speak.>

"S-speak... what?"

From her mouth, you heard her say that strange lenguage but yet, you understood her words at least, the meaning behind those words, her mouth twitch into a small smile, nay, a grin, before it reverted back into a frown and a hard look.

<I have linked our minds, creature. through this mind link we understand each other not by our words but by our thoughts in the dreamscape>

Oh?

<But enough of this! I'm going to ask this only once!> her voice sounded hard and commanding, you gulped in fear and nodded weakly. <Who and what. Are. You?>

"M-my name is ...." You say your name, a bit shakily ".. A-and I'm a human.. I am correctly on... somebody's stomatch."

She risen an eyebrow and made a face. <Surely you're joking,>

"I am serious!" You explain to the equine what just happened, how you reappeared on a giant kid's room, she glowered a bit but you explained you did nothing to them and got away until you were hit by a gust of wind and landed on a mug and then explained the rest...

You don't understand why you're arguing with a horse... unicorn, thing but she looked pretty intimidating, by it being a dream or not, she looked pretty real to you.

Right she was thinking and absorbing what you just said and she looked...
1353111222121.title: Talked.. and you understood her.

13531112221211.content:
She looked thoughtful, she looked slightly at first disturbed but it turned into... curiosity? cautiously more likely, her hard look subside replacing it with a more neutral look on her Equine face..

<I believe you, Human.> she answered <I do not sense any deceit in your words and I believe you ro be no threat to my subjects.">

You breathe a sigh of relief. "Oh Thank god, you believe- wait, Ponies?"

<Indeed, Human. You are in the land of Equestria, the land ruled by me and my sister.>

"Alright.. so.. both are some sort of um, Equine Gods?" She snorted, which was kind of appropriate.

<No human, Although I'm are flattered for the comparison, my sister and I are not deities nor do we wish to be.> She explained <Nevertheless, We are aware of your situation unfortunately, We can't do much about..>

"Figures.. I mean, this is a dream after all." Unless I'm dreaming within a dream? you thought.

<I know.> Her head hangs down and... looked sadly. <We are sorry for judging thy unfairly and wasn't necessary.> She said but then she looked up <But we do know were thy vessel is located, As for who hath feast upon thy, remains unsolved but don't not fret, we-..> Suddenly the world was turning.. white?

"W-what is happening?"

<You are waking up.> She smiles, this time a bit more friendly <Fret Not! For we shall speak again!>
13531112221211.title: Well, Hellooo Princess!

135311122212111.content:
You woke shortly after talking to the Not-Goddess Equine of your dream. What a strange dream You though so. You were still floating on the green stomach acid of your host.

The levels of acid seems to have dwindled you did also see that there aren't any piece of food around anymore, all that left was just mass that were slowly breaking down and pushed toward the sphincter nearby by the Stomach's muscles or the small rivers of acid.

Now you don't have to but you could go through there and well, leave. You still have a mission to do and was somebody to help you return back to normal and the intestines seem like a good start, gross but still better than still trapped here.

However you could rest a bit more and maybe rub the flesh that provided warm and comfort.
135311122212111.title: Into the waking world..

135311122212112.content:
Luna 'woke' up from her trance, while going through the dreamscape, she wandered off to Ponyville, the town where she had made wonderful memories just right after her liberation from the Darkness that plagued her mind for one thousand years.

She made sure to going there after finishing Canterlot's dreamscape.

She went for young fillies and colts first, tending their dreams, fencing off their Nightmares.

However. he entered into a very... strange dream.

It was normal at first but it looked less.. colorful,but relatively normal, it felt more like a memory so she assumed that it was a bad memory but not it was more like a sandbox, a mindscape. Then she met him, the creatu- Human.

She never encountered such being before. biped like a Minotaur or a Diamond Dog, practically hairless except for its- his head. It reminds of her of primates but his face was close to that of a pony except for not have a muzzle like one and had smaller eyes. He didn't understood Equiss, the primary language of Equestria not that it mattered giving his alien origins, he sounds and felt sincere and confused, somewhat scared even.

Although she could blame herself for that, she admittedly knew that she was being hard but it was necessary to know the human's true intention, his surfaces though gave her a lot of information much more that he told her directly but only confirmed her something, he wasn't from Equestria, he wasn't even aware if he was in his world anymore..

However the Revelation that one of her subjects seems to have eaten him which horrified her but the Human didn't sounded concerned for his own health, he even revealed to her that the stomach didn't harmed him like he feared which alleviate her, the magic of her subject's body seem to have recognized Anon as a living being and prevented the acid from digesting him. While in the dreamscape she pinpointed his location silently, He was on the Rich Family Household in Ponyville, home of Filthy and Spoiled Rich and their only filly, Diamond Tiara.

She get off the bed and walked to the balcony, letting her mind to wonder and think the next course of action, this all boil down to a question.

Should she reveal the Tiny Human's existence to her Sister?
135311122212112.title: Switch perspective. (Luna)

1353111222121122.content:
No... she didn't need to know, at least not yet. Luna could handle this by herself. She would just approach the mare and explain that she had accidentally swallowed a living creature that contacted the princess through dreams, then remove him from her body forthwith. Simple, right? Then she would reveal his existence to her sister. Luna smiled dreamily. Upon meeting the human something stirred within her, something that she couldn't yet identify and was still trying to work out. He definitely left an impression on the night princess, maybe those feelings would resolve upon finally meeting him in person. She only hoped that this Spoiled Rich wouldn't be too reluctant to give up the tiny creature.

Luna slowly closed her eyes, and soon slipped off into her own dreams.
1353111222121122.title: No.

13531112221211221.content:
Luna woke up on the next day, a bit more early in order to lower the moon so her Sister could begin the morning, a routine morning ritual they resumed after her return from her banishment.

The morning and breakfast were normal, The sisters say their greetings and ate their breakfast coming from the best chef the Kingdom has to offer. As it should be.

However, her mind was on another thing, the retrieval of the Human within Spoiled Rich's Stomach, she hadn't anything better to do other than still trying to catch up modern Equestria culture with a various degree of success until the night time where it's her turn to rule, She has plenty of time.

She needed to be discreet about it, though, she normally doesn't go outside during Daytime unless for a special occasion. It is weird for a Princess associated with the Night strolling in the daytime as if it was the most casual thing in the world, it could cause unwanted attention. A disguise was in order.

She excuses herself after finishing her food and left without much fanfare only saying that she was going to take a walk, her sister didn't bother to ask on where or why. Luna wasn't the social type, a trait that her sister, Celestia, finds a bit concerning but Luna finds her worries to be unfounded.

After returning to her room, Her horn glows in an azure color and in a flash, she transformed into a dark blue unicorn mare with black and magenta mane and tail, her cutie mark was that of a rising blue moon.

"This will do." She commented herself, deciding to take the moniker of Azure Moonlight and with that, she teleported into the outskirt of Ponyville to begin her small mission.
13531112221211221.title: Next day

135311122212112211.content:
Luna strode into town without incident. Her disguise was so perfect that she gathered not a single passing glance from any of the townsponies. Her path took her into the center of town, a prime place to gather information on Spoiled Rich's whereabouts.
         The best place to start would be the place where the most ponies gather, which by the looks of things would be either Sugar Cube Corner, the Marketplace or the town square. She started with SCC first, partially because she rushed out and skipped breakfast so her tummy was rumbling.
         She walked up to the wing doors smiling and greeting everypony she met as she passed by, fulfilling her persona of a slightly ditzy unicorn mare that was visiting her family in town, which was not a dishonest assertion.          Luna really did consider the Element Bearers close friends and almost family in a way. It pained her to put on a mask and lie to her subjects but she didn't want to draw too much attention to herself and scare off her target..
         As she stepped into the shop a familiar pink puffball was mareing the sweets cabinet, with a respectably long line ahead of her. Luna stepped into line behind a mint colored unicorn and waited her turn, stepping in time to the movement of the line until she was the only one left. SCC had a similar track record for efficiency that they did for their delicious pastries, it seemed
         Upon stepping up to the counter Pinkie Pie turned to Luna smiling her signature goofy grin, and with precision born from practice she recited "Welcome to Sugar Cube Corner, the sweetest sweetest shop in town! What can I get you todaâ€”" She suddenly gasped. "Princess Luna what are you doing heâ€”"
         Before she could finish, in a panic Luna snapped her mouth shut with magic. Even then, Pinkie continued to try to speak. Luna rolled her eyes and hissed, "I'm going to let your mouth go, and you will speak no more of my true identity, understand?" Pinkie fervently nodded, and Luna released her hold on her. Luna nodded at the door she entered from and said "We will speak outside in private,"
         "Okie dokie lokie pony-I've-never-met-before, I'll just need to inform Mrs. Cake I'll be stepping out for a minute," turning to walk into a door in the rear wall.
         Luna smiled and nodded, gracious of Pinkie's respect and understanding. "Take your time, my little pony. I'll be waiting here."
         Soon Pinkie returned with a grape jelly donut, which happened to be Luna's favorite, though she knew better than to ask her how she knew that. "Just thought you'd be hungry, especially since you skipped breakfast this morning." Again, not gonna ask.
         Luna did have a few other questions for the pink pony, namely about the whereabouts of one Spoiled Rich.
         Before she could utter a word however, Pinkie managed to get the first word in. "So... uh, Princess? Why do you look like that?"
135311122212112211.title: Luna stroll in Ponyville.

Pinkie gave a swift and snappy salute. "You can count on me, princess!"
Luna giggled as she closed in on the front door. "I do hope so Miss Pie, or I might have to gobble your backside. Ah, now here we are. Would you like to do the honors?"

After a few long moments the door opened and Spoiled Rich herself stood in the doorway, looking

13531112221211221111.title: Pissed

135311122212112211111.content:
Luna chose not to reveal herself at that moment, putting herself into the cranky mare's horseshoes. She and Pinkie had shown up out of the blue and began hammering on her door, of course she would be more than a little displeased. Instead, she put on her most dazzling smile and spoke in a fake valley girl accent. "Hi! My name is Azure Moonlight and I;m from the Circle of Earth Agricultural Society, based in Manehatten, Do you mind if I take up just a bit of your time? It's really important, I promise."
Not entirely a lie. The Circle of Earth is a real organization that seeks out the best and brightest potential candidates for their agricultural schools. Luna herself is on the governing board of directors and oversees the testing of student knowledge and abilities. There is, of course, no record of any "Azure Moonlight" on their books, a fact that Luna might have to use her royal powers to retroactively correct.
Spoiled's dour expression turned to one of puzzlement. "I wasn't aware that an Earth pony organization would recruit a unicorn among their ranks."
"I'm earth pony on my mother's side," Luna smoothly answered. Unicorn and Pegasus too, but she didn't need to know that.
"I see..." Spoiled drawled with a look of mild contempt, then pointed over to Pinkie, who was currently spekaing to (flirting with?) a lawn statue.. "What's she doing here then? I already know who she is. She organized my daughter's cuteceñeara, didn't she?"
"Miss Pie has been an invaluable resource in guiding me through the sprawling streets of Ponyville. Believe me when I say you aren't an easy mare to find."
"Could've just looked for the biggest mansion in town and saved yourself a lot of trouble..." Spoiled muttered, before she winced and folded a hoof over her chest for a moment.
Luna tried to surreptitiously do a scan on her body to locate the lost human but before she could, the mare came back to focus.
"Are you quite alright?" Luna asked with concern.
"I'm *urp* fine. So now that you're here, waddaya want? I'm a busy mare and I can't be seen prattling *urp* on with a couple of common townsfolk on my front doorstep."
Luna snorted.. She was anything but common, and this impudent mare would do well to remember that. Nevertheless, she kept her composure and her smile didn't waver. She got her curious at least, which was going to make this go so much smoother.
"Ah, yes, you see, it's actually about your daughter, Diamond Tiara.. The Circle of Earth Society has selected your daughter to be a possible candidate for their junior summer training program, in which she would receive an all expenses paid trip to—"
"I'm NOT sending DT to school to be an Aggie, if that's what you're asking." Spoiled interrupted forcefully. "She's going to stay here and learn the family business, and eventually, take over."
"I still want to test her fertility magic, for the record so I don;t go back empty hooved..."
If nothing else this was something she could bring this information back with her and try again another time.
Spoiled slapped a hoof against her face, then surprisingly, acquiesced to Luna's request. . "Ugh, FINE. Ok, you win. Just make this quick,"
Spoiled turned and trotted into the house, yelling at her daughter to come down because she had visitor.
Luna grinned and turned to shout back at Pinkie. "Pinkie, with me!"
The perky pink pony immediately bounced after Luna, entering into the fancy mansion house.
135311122212112211111.title: Kept her cool and remained profesional

1353111222121122111111.content:
Entering the mansion, Luna has to commend Spoiled's taste at least. Aside from having multiple portraits of her or her family all around, the floor was totally covered with expensive red carpet there few small statues of ponies or just head of ponies more likely her family members.

The mansion looked even bigger on the inside, with large stairs that go to the second floor, there were portraits of her and her family as well ponies she hadn't seen before but looked old, both the pony in question and the quality of the portrait which confirm that her fortune might be inherited, this level of smugness and superiority come from a family that it old and powerful to hold a firm grasp of the town's economy and know how to exercise it and increase.

While no a noble this was really comparable to one in term of power and capital holding but Noble had a bit more due to their family and ancestry.

This was impressive.

But also disturbing.

Such elitist ambient would make a pony see their fellow as a failure and low life, inferior in their eyes, flaunting their own successes and only seeing ponies similar to them as equal, it encourages any foal coming from similar family to follow this mindset.

The filly that comes down the stairs was the heir of the fortune this mare would leave to her, Diamond Tiara, Luna knows her, couldn't help but smile since she seems to not share her mother's... elitist mentality, they frowned on looking each other but then beamed on seeing Pinkie Pie but confused to look at her.

Whatever happened to break that mentality of her doesn't matter but she was glad for it

"Hello, little one." She says "My name is Azure Moonlight and I come from-"

"Get on with it!" Spoiled ordered.

"Mom!"

"It's alright, We don't intend to stay here for long." Luna sighed and began to cast the fertility test; it was a simple spell that shows the strength of an Earth Pony's inner magic, An Earth Pony inner magic is shown in their ability to grow anything in the soil, this is the reason why poverty in Equestria is unheard of,

It also plays a key role in their biology, Earth Ponies has higher fertility rates than any other tribe, a blessing from the stars above so they will never go extinct, Pegasus and Unicorns has increased their numbers by interbreeding with Earth Ponies for centuries.

"What are you going to do miss?" Diamond Tiara asked as Luna charged her spell, She also charged a scan and teleportation spell, mostly for the tiny. doing three spells is a bit tricky for an Alicorn like her, She wasn't masterful on magic like her Sister and Twilight.

Something she sourly admits.

"It's just something quick, It just a small scan spell. Tell me if you feel something wrong during the whole process."

Diamond Tiara nodded and remained still, Luna then quickly fired up the spell to scan her body all while scanning Spoiled Rich as well. The feedback coming from the spell coming to her mind, She found the tiny in her stomach as expected but also saw something else, her eyes widened a bit.

They had a lot of magic in them.

"Something wrong." Diamond Tiara asked "I feel a bit funny."

"It is nothing young one, I need to make a deeper scan." Luna said

This could be a problem, She never expected them to have so much energy in their bodies, Teleporting the human out of Spoiled can prove to be a problem with so much magic interfering with the spell. In theory, it could teleport him into somepony else now that she has to divide her focus for three additional spells.

However, she was an alicorn, This shouldn't be a problem.

Right..?

1353111222121122111111121.content:
Diamond Tiara suddenly felt a sort of flutter in her stomach that she couldn't quite explain, like something had just been dropped deep inside her, so she attributed the cause to the scanning spell she was being hit with.
The bright bluish glow slowly faded until the room came back into focus.
Luna panted heavily at the huge amount of magical effort she had just undertaken, it was a wonder she didn't completely exhaust her mana supply. Such an endeavor surely would've left her in a dangerously tired and vulnerable state.
"Well? What did you find?" the mother sharply demanded, somehow unfazed by the spectacle that had occurred right in front of her.
She was taken aback when, for the first time, the normally bright and cheery "unicorn" pony turned and gave her a sour look, then turned her gaze back on the curious, and somewhat fearful filly.
"She is... quite fertile." She finally replied through gasping breaths while reaching out a hoof and patting Diamond's mane, "And quite a tough but to crack as well. My magic was unable to completely penetrate due to the high amount of magical interference I encountered so I cannot make a clear assessment as of yet. Let it be known that this filly is of intense interest to us and we will return to her for a followup in the future."
She straightened up onto wobbly legs and walked forward a bit until she was right next to Pinkie.
Luna thanked the two for their time and was escorted by a worried looking Pinkie Pie outside of the house.

Luna magic increased with her power but was met with strong, unexpected resistance from the internal magic of Spoiled, however, she refused to let that surpass her, she was the princess of the night and she'll succeed in this challenge!
