The foals were almost certainly not Filthy's, which would make it a bit hard to explain whenever he returned home. Angry things would be said. He would probably file for a divorce, taking away Diamond Tiara and leaving her with the burden of motherhood. She had more than enough shares in the company to support herself, she was worth millions of bits in her own right so it's not like she would be reduced to living in a hovel. She just didn't want to lose her only daughter.

Spoiled almost didn't notice a small form leaning up against her for comfort, softly nuzzling her chest. Smiling a little despite herself, she reached out a hood and gently patted the filly's head, continually stroking her mane until their carriage arrived home.
13532221111111112111222111111311.title: Returning Home.

135322211111111121112221111113111.content:
When they reached their home, they remained silent. it was awkward that for the first time, the halls once filled with assorted sounds of servants, cooks or even the sound of outside now was all silent.

Both of them looked each other, still not saying anything until Spoiled Rich decided to talk.

"Diamond, sweetie." Spoiled Rich thought on what she carefully want to say, she didn't want her daughter to reach the wrong conclusion. "Tell me, did you brought a colt with you along Silver Spoon?"

Diamond Tiara was confused on her mom's question but shook her head causing her to sigh. "Why? I did say I don't have coltfriend."

This narrow down to only the house's servants which most, if not all, are mares themselves during the season.

She sighed, there was no point on speculating who is the father of hers and Diamond's foal, her...grandfoal. The thought was not on her and her pregnancy but on Diamond Tiara and her future, She didn't want her to face the hardship of motherhood alone and neither to lose her to a possible divorce which was an immediate concern. she looked on her daughter. There was a lot of things she wanted to say to her, so many regrets and wrong decisions, maybe these will be the last time she and Diamond will be together.

"Mom, what's wrong?" Diamond Tiara asked innocently as she saw her mother's sad demeanor come back and prepared herself for the upcoming mood swing but instead she was embraced and pulled into a tight hug.

"Diamond, What do you think of mother-daughter weeks, just before your father comes back."

"Really? I would love to!" She says as she hugged her back.
135322211111111121112221111113111.title: WHo is the Father?

1353222111111111211122211111131111.content:
The following months were spent mending the broken relationship between mother and daughter, and generally having a good time. Spoiled had requested that Diamond move in and sleep in her room for the time being, a request which the filly happily complied. The pair went on spa dates, ate ice cream, played games and even went fishing, an activity Diamond had always wanted to try. Every night they would cuddle together for warmth, with Spoiled protectively surrounding the filly with her body.

The first thing Spoiled did was go to the local seamstress and commission a pair of maternity, dresses, enchanted to increase to stretch to any size regardless of girth. Rarity's eyebrows slowly threatened to leave her face as Spoiled explained the situation but she took the order nonetheless. Spoiled felt like telling one of the biggest gossip mills in town her secret was probably a foolish mistake, but the truth was going to come out eventually and she was not one to run away from her problems but face them head on, for Diamond's sake.

Mother and daughter's began to noticeably fill out around the barrel as time went on, partially because of the amount of food they ate. Spoiled felt closer to her daughter than ever. Before, they were drifting apart because their drifting viewpoints, and ironically it took a bad situation to push them together and make them talk to each other. Spoiled felt almost grateful to the mysterious donor and wished that she could at least meet him once.

Mysteriously, the steady stream of letters sent from Filthy every week slowed down to a trickle, and then eventually stopped. His last letter stated that he was going to be dealing with a powerful potential new group of investors that he admitted were probably just a bit on the shady side, That letter was several weeks ago and there had been no reply since.

Spoiled was starting to get worried that something had happened, but she trusted that her husband could take care of himself.
1353222111111111211122211111131111.title: Months of Reconciliation.

13532221111111112111222111111311111.content:
It didn't take long for them to long for the mother and daughter to grow and make their pregnancies know and visible. it was to begin contrast with their size.

Diamond Tiara, for being a small filly, her belly began with a small bulge that was growing on the following weeks, despite her initial discomfort in the early months, she was starting to get used to and began to enjoy the squirming feeling in her belly, giggling each time on feeling her foal move.

The reaction on the school was to be expected but that's where her popularity rose up again with fillies all over her asking on how and who was the father which she only responded with a giggle. She let her friends and other fillies and colts to caress and feel the foal move in her tummy.

Silver Spoon was indeed jealous despite saying otherwise but so were fillies like the Cutie Marks Crusaders and even Dinky Hooves.

Spoiled Rich was completely different yet similar, unlike Diamond Tiara, her belly grew in more accelerated pace growing twice its size the next week, it was becoming difficult to walk, her squirming belly almost reaching the floor but yet, just like Diamond, her belly had begun to give her fame, she was the main topic now as the Mare with the most, if not the biggest amount of foals gestating within her womb, an icon of fertility through Ponyville, if not, all Equestria.

Whispers were that she was blessed by the stars or by the Princesses themselves, one that Twilight confirmed to be not true at all and the princesses have no involvement whatsoever but it was a topic that even reached the ears of Canterlot which only gave her more fame. She noticed an air of envy from some other mares in the town especially from the Baker Cup Cake from Sugarcube Corner.

Her teats had grown considerably, giving milk almost constantly that she needed help on milking her, that went on using a milking device borrowed from the Apple Family but most of the time, Diamond Tiara came and helped her by suckling on her teats, sometimes, accompanied with one or more of her friends.

Her flanks also grew, her hips and body preparing for the upcoming labor. but also was working as Stallion magnet that stopped by and checks her out, attention is good but none approached her and revealed to be the one that sired

Still, the scary part is that they still don't know the exact number of foals growing inside of her, thanks the heaven for the elasticity Ponykind had, otherwise, she would've been in danger.

"Hehe." Diamond Tiara Giggled rubbing her belly "He is happy!"

"He?" Rich mused "How do you know its a He?" She asks

"I don't but I got the feeling that my foal is a lively colt." Diamond Tiara answered. "The Doctor says that is going to be a unicorn"

"A Unicorn?"

"Uh-hu!" She said, "Though they aren't sure as they saw wings forming instead previously." she says while making herself comfy on her mother's growing belly, loving the way her siblings were squirming.

Her mother smiled "Maybe its a little Alicorn." She says as a joke. the probability of that was completely null but it does paint a very amusing thought, her grandfoal being alicorn. Still, it doesn't say much on who could be the father, the doctors weren't pretty helpful at all on her end, they were still unable to identify the numbers of the babies she was having. Just when they thought they had the number, the next exam and scan shows completely different numbers and maybe the only way to know for certain it was the day of the labor.

"Mrs. Rich" One the servants approached her a young pegasus mare "You have a letter, its... from the Griffin Kingdom." She says in a very stiff tone. "Its directly addressed to you."

Letter from the Griffin Kingdom, its Filthy Rich after a month of silence. She thanked the maid as she moved away quickly as she could Allowing her to open the letter and read it on peace, a concept that was shattered upon reading its content.

She reread it again and again and she couldn't still believe what

It was a letter from the Griffin Kingdom's Government informing her that her husband has been arrested after making illegal dealing to a criminal organization and corrupt elements within the kingdom and profiting from their unlawful operations using a false alias, bank account of ghost companies among many others things.

When things seemed to sort itself up, once again, Life seems to punch her in the face, again...

There was a second letter and it was from Filthy Rich, informing that he didn't know how shady were those investors and was caught up in a nasty confrontation that ended being unjustly arrested and correctly being deported to Equestria for pending trial.

She wanted to believe him, she really does, but when the last letter was several weeks old that said that he was dealing with possible corrupt investors...

"It is from Dad?" Diamond asked, snapping from her thoughts. This caused her an idea, divorce seems almost inevitable now but she could turn this on her side...

"Yes, and he is returning." She says, internally grinning as she forms a plan.

"Really?" Tiara asked surprised, almost eager but said emotions were squashed on what she told next.

"I don't think so, Tiara, he has done very bad things that he is being put on trial."

"What? How bad?" She say, her tone dropping. it almost broke her heart now on seeing her like that she pulled her into a hug, rubbing her mane.

"Very... but I'm sure we'll get through this.."
13532221111111112111222111111311111.title: They start to get bigger

135322211111111121112221111113111111.content:
Ponyville didn't have a proper jail so Filthy had to shipped all the way to Manehatten to be judged. He was charged with with fraud, bribery of a government official and tax evasion, based on the documents that Spoiled had secretly provided. The trial proceeded over several days, with the prosecution and defense hotly arguing over Filthy's fate. Notably Spoiled Rich and her daughter were not in attendance because they each had a scheduled doctor's appointment to go to. After all the presenting of evidence and loud bickering going on in the courtroom the judge had finally had enough. He sentenced Filthy Rich to ten years in prison with the possibility of parole for good behavior, and FIlthy was summarily hauled away by guards and put in lock-up.

Later, while in his jail cell Filthy recieved a letter from his wife which read as follows:

         Dear Filthy, I know that what you're going through is hard, so I don't mean to cause any more distress than I have to. If you say that you're innocent then I believe you. However, even if your hooves are completely clean of any wrongdoing you made a conscious decision to associate with a group that you yourself even admitted were full of dangerous criminal elements, and I know that you've had dealings with ponies of similar ill repute in the past. On that you have nopony to blame but yourself. I you had only shown a little more prudence in your business dealings you wouldn't be in this mess. The safety of your daughter should also be taken into account as well. Do you really want our daughter to become the target of some thug with a grudge against you? You need to get your head on straight and really think about what's really important n life. That's why I regret to inform you that I'm officially cutting ties and filing for divorce. I'm having the papers drawn up as I'm writing this letter, and they will be delivered to you within a few days. I'm sorry I had to do this, but I assure you I have only our daughter's best interest in mind. I'm sorry.
Love,
Spoiled Rich

Witnesses say that upon reading the letter Filthy Rich immediately burst into tears and was inconsolable until the prison doctors could administer a sedative.
135322211111111121112221111113111111.title: Filthy Rich's Trial and Divorce.

1353222111111111211122211111131111111.content:
It's been months now since the divorce and so far, things were improving now and then, Diamond Tiara for her part did shed tears for her father which hurt Spoiled Ri- Milk's (Better be using that maiden name now) to the core but managed to move on after understanding the nature of Rich's dealing which allows her to continue her life.

Months passed by and they were still the center of attention but for another reason entirely, it was the whole Filthy Rich fiasco, she made sure to end any rumor that ties her and the the griffin incident which was a success gaining sympathetic votes thanks to their pregnancies. As both were growing, it was Spoiled's belly grew in a faster rate to the point that she couldn't move without any help. Diamond's belly was also big for the filly's body, almost touching the ground.

"Ooh, He is very active today." Diamond said holding her squirming belly, her foal was confirmed colt but there wasn't any indication that it was either a Pegasus, Earth Pony or Unicorn, the scans were inconclusive.

Spoiled, however, was still in the dark with the number of foals in her womb, she knew that the majority was Earth Ponies Fillies but were some odd numbers of pegasis and unicorns but doctors had identified some other that may have deformity... or perhaps indices of other completely different species. A clue of who the father may be.

The Doctors weren't clear but it was almost certain to be the case.

"Well, your siblings are having one of those Pinkie Party in my womb, ugh." Spoiled was bigger, way bigger than she was before, her belly taking half of the hall' space. Her belly squirming with the kicks of her foals.A wave of sadness washed over her, how she is going to tell to Diamond that she may not take in all the foals in and raise them together.

Given the size she has and the lack of exact numbers, she may have to put the majority of those foals to adoption. She was rich but no that rich. besides, raising them would be total chaos of a task,, almost like raising an army from the very birth.

She could feel the day appreaching, it is only matter of time.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111.title: Final months before birth

13532221111111112111222111111311111111.content:
When the day finally arrived Spoiled was so big that she could scarcely move, so she had a specialized bed built just for her large body to ease the birthing process. Her delivery was to be observed by none other than the Princess of Friendship herself, who would be taking notes and recording the phenomenon for future study. Diamond Tiara had her own place nearby her mother, and would serve as moral support and comfort Spoiled during the arduous labor. Diamond Tiara had her own doctor to look after her own needs and deliver her child when the time came.

A team of massage therapists on loan from the Ponyville Spa made sure that the mother and child duo were comfortable in spite of their limited mobility and regularly massaged their aching backs and somachs, while also placing candles burning with essential oils to create a relaxing atmosphere. Spoiled and Diamond were pretty much the center of attention and gossip around the small town and everypony was waiting with bated breath for something to happen.

It was surprisingly Diamond's water that broke first, necessitating a hasty call to the doctors to come into the room and check on her condition. Twilight Sparkle entered as well, holding a notebook and pen in her magic, ready to jot down any notes that she needed to. The contractions were coming on strong, making the young filly wince every time her cervix flexed. She hadn't expected the birth to proceed so quickly or that there would be this much pain. The doctor assured her that it was completely normal to feel discomfort during the delivery and that it would all be over soon as long as she pushed. Spoiled held the hoof of her daughter and spoke comforting words to her, softly tussling her ears After about 30 minutes of intense pushing the one of the attending nurses noted "I can see the head. Looks like a unicorn." making the purple alicorn quickly lower her head and scribble like crazy on her little notepad.
"Wait.." Twilight paused her writing to listen to the nurse speak. "Wait, that isn't... Holy Celestia, are those wings?!"
Everypony was in shock at the nurse's words. Could it be true? Spoiled Rich's mouth dropped open. The only one who didn't react was Diamond Tiara herself, who was a little too out of it due to the pain.
Twilight dropped her notebook and teleported over near the filly's gaping flower "What?! Where, where? Show me!" she demanded.
The nurse pointed her hoof at the half emerged colt, pointing at the still slimy wet matted fur near the back of the neck. The mass located there looked far too thick to be fur, meaning there would be two tiny appendages marking the wings of a pegasus. The wings of a pegasus on a unicorn coming from an earth pony could mean only one thing. "It's an alicorn. A male alicorn. It's has to be." the princess quietly murmured.
Moving the doctors out of the way, she gripped the colt's body gently in her magic and tugged. His body moved a little bit, but not enough to free him from the filly's body. She tugged again, this time casting a numbing spell while tugging with ever greater strength. With a POP, the colt came free from the fleshy vice, trailing a little umbilical cord and part of the placenta behind him. The colt chose that moment to come alive and began screeching its lungs out, causing everypony to cover their ears, and the room began to visibly shake from the noise he was making. Twilight cut the cord with her magic and sheepishly handed him off to a nearby nurse, who looked traumitized from the whole affair. She took him into the next room to be cleaned up and weighed so the doctors can focus on the elder mare.
13532221111111112111222111111311111111.title: Day of Birth.

135322211111111121112221111113111111111.content:
The surprise that her daughter, Diamond Tiara gave birth to an Alicorn. Many things started to pass through her head regarding the future of her daughter but it seemed that it has been secured with the birth of this colt. her thoughts, however, were halted upon feeling the familiar pressure on her lower belly and the sudden pain that came from it.

"Oh Celestia, they're coming!" The moment she says those words the doctor and twilight moved immediately while auxiliary nurses came to attend the tired Diamond Tiara. most of the doctor and professionals came to the elder mare and began the labor process as Spoiled's cervix flexed as the first foal began to come out of Spoiled's fleshy confines, there was less complication compared to the filly as Spoiled's body was bigger than her daughter.

Twilight simply continue to write on the birthing process as the first filly was born, as expected, an Earth Pony and move her to the nursery along with the little alicorn. The process continues for next hours as more and more fillies and some occasional colts being born mostly Earth Ponies, some pegasis and unicorns while being a momentary nurse by cutting the cords and handle them to the real nurses to clean them.

Spoiled for her part got used to the pain but felt another thing she actually didn't it was possible.

Pleasure.

She felt pleasure as well pain when birthing her foals. She knew that the line between pain and pleasure was a blur one but this was simply a unique experience, it might have to do when birthing more than just one foal and the one that she was literally popping them out of constantly like a machine or foal factory may have to do with it.

Maybe she got used to it that the most she was doing now were panting and grunting while pushing her foals out of her womb after a while.

Or maybe were the sedatives.

It took almost 24 hours straight until there were only 3 more foals left in her womb. however they were different.

"Dear Celestia what is that?" One of the Nurses says as the thing came out of Spoiled's Vulva, it was the first time they see something like it, but Twilight gasped upon noticing.

"That's a Human baby and its a girl!" Now they look on it was a cute looking specimen. Just like before Twilight cut the cord while handling the baby to the nurse all while having a widening smile in her face "I think we now know the species of the father."

"She is not the only one.." Coming out was another human baby, this time a boy. "Twins."

"Actually..."

"Can you both shut up, this is the last one!" Spoiled grunted feeling the last foal, her body largely returned back to its original size, well almost. She was tired, panting heavily and about to pass out

"You can do it, ma'am, just this one!"

Determined, she took a deep breath and began to push, this last foal from her overworked womb.

"I can see a horn, come on. Push!"

"You can do it, mom!" It was Diamond Tiara's turn to hold her mother's hooves. as she continues to push soon the head and then the body came out of her fleshy gateway, another gasp, another nurse muttered 'No way...' as finally Twilight herself looked on the shock.

"Another... Alicorn.." She breathes out softly. This time a little filly with a tiny horn and wings, unlike Tiara's, this was simply yawned. She repeated the process handle the foal to the nurse.

"Wow... how many foals were delivered?"

"I can help with that, it was a total of-"

"428." Twilight said with a smile "A Small Army of adorable little foals."

"That's including the two monkey things-

"Humans." She corrected

"Right.. and the Alicorn?"

"Yep, I think we this I have all the notes I need, I can't wait to tell the Princesses. We still have to find the father thought but this narrows things down considerably."

Just as the Doctor and Twilight talked, Spoiled looked on her Daughter and she looked back they smiled each other as now that the worse was over but the Elder mare felt a small pit forming in her stomach, how is she going to explain that she is going to give most of those foals to adoption?

How both are they going to handle it?

None of them knew or noticed that a tiny figure came out of the filly's vagina and onto the floor, drenched in filly juice wile hiding from the view.
135322211111111121112221111113111111111.title: Spoiled's delivery

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
In the end Spoiled Milk could only keep a small fraction of the foals delivered, sending the rest to homes with loving parents. Spoiled made sure they were well cared for and provided a sum of money for each to keep for the future. She kept the alicorn filly, the two "human" children, and three other fillies which were unicorn, pegasus, and earth pony respectively. Diamond Tiara was sad to see her new brothers and sisters go but understood that it was for the best.

Being the mothers of not one but two alicorns earned the two widespread fame and looks of awe. They were invited by multiple newspapers for interviews to explain exactly how they had managed such a feat, but they turned down every one. Despite the attention Spoiled only wanted to raise the few children that remained in peace. Spoiled sold the extravagant mansion she used to live in and purchased a more moderately sized home to provide a homely environment for her foals, leaving a generous severance paycheck for their longtime servants.
Most of them were sad to see her go, and one after another came up and hugged her with tearful goodbyes.


After about a month all the colts and fillies were already running around the house, getting into things and generally causing trouble. All except for the twin humans, which had barely even started to crawl and even then still needed constant supervision. Spoiled was worried that something was wrong with them. She consulted with Princess Twilight, who seemed to know the most about the odd creatures and was quickly assured that it was completely normal and that they would be up and running in a year's time. This eased Spoiled's mind somewhat but caused her to be quite a bit more overprotective of these two.
Diamond Tiara was a doting mother to her own child, fussing over his appearance and regularly combing his hair and his tiny wings, just like a real prince. Spoiled wondered if this made them royalty, as every alicorn born or created recent memory had been named a princess and given their own fiefdom to rule over. Other than the requisite congratulations and pat on the back she received no official word yet from the other princesses on the future of her children.

Despite a widespread search the father was still not found, meaning that Spoiled was still in the dark as to the origins of her and Diamond's children. She lay awake at night thinking on the whereabouts of the mysterious :human" that eluded all means of detection and capture, slowly rubbing her belly. He had changed her life in the best way possible and yet she didn't even know what he looked like. She had no trouble raising her foals herself but she would at least like for them to know their own father. If he's out there, she wondered what he's doing now, and if he's thinking of her.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: The Aftermath

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
The next days has been pretty much normal with the children well-behaving, Diamond has dropped off the school but was something to be expected, she still has frequent visits from the CMC and Silver Spoon and even helped on the house and the children which were a handful of times.

There were times she could feel a presence watching, it wasn't malicious but that's until she found something... or rather someone resting between her engorged round teats as she woke up for the next day...
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Next

choices: Spoiled rich shows the tiny human to her duaghter
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
Spoiled Rich could feel... something on her lower belly when she awoke that morning. She couldn't tell if it was an itch or if something was moving around in her fur. She didn't want to get up just yet so she laid in her bed with eyes half open, staring at the ceiling. She yawned, lazily snaking a hoof underneath he bed sheet to scratch the itch. Somehow, the itch sensed her intentions and moved backwards towards her crotch, settling in between her still swollen teats. Spoiled tried again but itch once again managed to evade her hoof, making her groan in frustration. "Argh, you little--" she growled, and then partially threw off the cover, jerking into an upright position and scanned her belly for any bugs crawling on her. What she saw there immediately stopped her cold. There was someone or something sitting in between her teats, looking directly at her. It didn't seem to be afraid at all, indeed, it had crawled into her like it wanted to get her attention. She tentatively reached out a hoof to poke near its position, and it finally moved, jumping on and clinging to the short fur. Spoiled brought the hoof up to her face to get a better look. He was very small, she could barely make out his small features. He was a bipedal being with cute little hands and feet and a body devoid of any fur. She could see a tiny little penis telling her that he's a male, and a small patch of hair covered the top of his head.

Spoiled Rich had trouble believing what she was seeing. Here, resting on her body was a perfect match for the description of a human. Possibly the same human that knocked both her and her daughter up, and he was so tiny a hundred of him could fit in the space of her frog. How long had he been there? Had he been there all this time, watching his own children grow in secret? Why had he waited to reveal himself before now? Spoiled felt her eyes sting as hot tears began to flow from her tear-ducts unbidden. All this time, he was right under her nose and she never even knew it.

She didn't know what to do. It was too dangerous for a creature of his size to be wandering around unprotected. She would have to take care of him as much as she did her... their children. She owed that much to him, for the positive change he made in her life. Spoiled wondered how Diamond would react... Diamond. Her eyes flew open in shock. She would have to show this to Diamond Tiara. Carefully handling the human in one hoof, she quickly rolled out of bed and made her way to her daughter's bedroom...
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: The Discovery

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
Spoiled rushed to her Daughter's room with the human on hoof and entering she found her waking up, Tiara looked on her mother on surprise.

"Mom?" Diamond Tiara groggily said but her sleepy eyes turned on concern after seeing her mother's tears "Mom, What's wrong?"

"Diamond.." She began "I found him."

"Found who?" Tiara inquires until her mother approached her, showing her the tiny human male who waved her, Diamond Tiara yelped on completely surprise only to look closely on the tiny male.

"The children's father.." Diamond Tiara's looked at her shock and went skeptical.

"He is the one that made us pregnant?" the Elder Mare nodded. "How? he is so tiny!"

"That's how. I don't know. But it may during the heat season, he was overpowered by our pheromones that must have enthralled him to knock us up by going within us."

"By 'within us' you mean..." Diamond hinted and glancing down to her filly parts which made her mother nods. "Oh.."

"Yes, to think that in this size, he was with us all this time watching over our children right under our nose." Spoiled says but then looked a bit conflicted, "But I can't help but worry, he is tiny and he can't be with next to his children without facing danger during this size."

"Maybe we should contact the Princesses?" Diamond Tiara asks "Twilight is the Princess of Magic, she can help him."

"Maybe but-" Just before she could finish that line, a letter appeared magically on the front of her and her daughter, causing Tiara to grasp it and open it. Her eyes went wide upon finishing reading.

"What was wrong?" Spoiled then grabs the letter and read, surprised on what she saw. It was from Twilight, the correct princess of Ponyville that She, Celestia and Luna will be discussing the future of her Alicorn child and her daughter's as it was a pretty important matter to be discussed and it can't be delayed any longer and that they were coming now.

In her house.

The Princesses were coming and in a few hours, they would come.

Simply, life was full of surprise.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: The Shocking Revelation.

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
Spoiled and Diamond Tiara hastily moved about the house, cleaning everything and making the foals look presentable for the princess' visit. Not knowing what to do with the human, she temporarily put him in a small cup with a small amount of water to drink, Spoiled felt a little embarrassed at treating the father of her children in that way but she didn't have time to worry about it right now. Thankfully her children didn't make too big of a fuss as she dressed them in their best clothing, and helping her daughter get her grandson's clothes on was fairly easy as well. She wondered if she should even bother for her two human children, who couldn't even walk yet, Ultimately she placed them in a bassinet with a soft blanket covering their bodies.

They were in the finishing stages of preparations when they heard a knock. Spoiled told Diamond to gather the foals while she answered the door, and then she walked up to the entrance, a hard lump forming in her throat. Spoiled reached for the knob, then hesitated, her brow breaking into a cold sweat. She wasn't about to make the princess knock twice, so she forced herself through her apprehension and twisted the knob. What awaited beyond the portal was the stern looking face of a royal guard.

"Ahem, could you move please? I'd like to see" A soft voice came from behind him. The guard bowed his head and moved out of the way, revealing a majestic white alicorn behind him. Princess Celestia herself was standing on her doorstep. Spoiled craned her neck to see if any tohers had come, and was not disappointed. To the back of her Spoiled could see Princess Luna, who was wearing a nice sunhat with a bored expression on her face, and Twilight Sparkle chatting with, surprisingly enough, Princess Cadance, who's own daughter was riding high on her back.

"Um, are you going to let me in?" The princess' voice snapped Spoiled out of her reverie, and she hastily replied "Yes, princess, of course, princess." while stepping out of the way to let the monarch pass. She respectfully bowed, not moving until the last princess had entered her home. Twilight hung around for a minute and placed a hoof on her shoulder. "There's no need to be scared. This is a truly special occasion and they all just wanted to be here to see it for themselves. So, no pressure."
Spoiled honestly didn't know if that helped or not. She wondered how they would react to tiny discovery she made that morning.
Looking up at Twilight, she nodded. Twilight smiled brightly. "All right then! Let's go join the others, shall we?"

When they walked into the living room the princess' had already taken their seats. Cadance had already set down Flurry to play with the other foals who was under the supervision of Diamond Tiara, and she along with Celestia were looking and making faces and silly noises at the human babies.
Luna held a pegasus pony in her lap, and was currently playing peekaboo with her wings over her eyes.
The scene was so cute that Twilight almost didn't want to ruin the moment, but there was limited time and they had a lot to discuss. She coughed loudly, announcing her presence and making the rest of the princess' look up. "Now that we're all here, I think it might be time to discuss what we talked about on the way here."
Luna reluctantly put the foal down while Celestia and Cadance twisted in their seats to face the younger pony.
"Now..."
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Royal Visit.

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
" Now... I believe its time for the reason we are here." Says Twilight. "Let me talk first, A lot has happened ever since you both gave birth, rumors started to come about fairly quickly about a pregnancy illness to you rising your own little army for overthrowing the Princesses... in the end, Rumors were more outlandish than the last but there were ones that have some degree true and were about questioning your ancestry."

"Our ancestry?"

"Yes, we investigated deeply on your bloodline and ancestry, to see if there is any relation with either us." Luna pointed on herself and Celestia "Or any other Alicorn in recorded history but we were unable to find somepony that match with your family, What we found were majority Earth Ponies." Luna ended.

"As result, we can't theorize that your foals were formed because of your ties of blood with the Alicorn tribe." Cadence finished.

"Which led to another theory, Spoiled Milk." Twilight spoke "It was possible that your Alicorn may be the product of multiple foals fusing into one during the early development in the womb, the count of foals within may have been as high of 608 but the womb couldn't logically take that number so instead of terminating the excess of fetuses, your body fused them together, being the majority Earth Ponies, the difference wasn't high or significant but those that were Pegasi, Unicorn mixed in the process, it lead to.. eh.."

"Crown Royale." Spoiled Milk answered, giving the name of her Alicorn Filly.

"Right, Crown Royale."

"But... what about me?" Diamond Tiara chimed in. "I was only pregnant with one and was an Alicorn too.."

"Indeed, Little One." It was Celestia Turn to talk "And so that Theory was also discarded which brought us back to not your bloodline but to the donor that made say miracle possible."

"You mean, the Human?"

"Yes, Diamond Tiara." Celestia answered, "It is possible and perhaps even certain that the human had something to do with, it could be his genes triggered something during the pregnancy that gave even the smallest possible to conceive an Alicorn foal and you both were the luckiest mare in all Equestria."

"Which makes a priority to reach him at once." Luna retakes the conversation "Even if the chances are small or uncertain, it still there and he could be the target of less pleasant individuals and be used as breeding livestock."

"As you can see, it is important we reach the foals' father for his safety," Celestia says, finishing Luna's comment in the matter.

Diamond Tiara and Spoiled Milk looked each other, they thought it would be the right time to talk about the Tiny man they found but before they could comment about him, Cadence says something.

"Now... for the Alicorn foals' validation for the Princehood title, it's been hotly discussed topic."

"Indeed, My Niece. We talked about it a lot but in the end, we reached the conclusion that the foals were to be given the title of prince and princess upon reaching a certain age." Celestia says "Originally, we were meant to give them Dukedom but this move was probably for the best and set those rumors and speculation to rest once and for all, especially since the first Alicorn born among you is a colt and that shouldn't be ignored"

With that say and done, it was discussed a lot about the foals future and the age where they will be notified about their coronation and the ceremony. When an Agreement was met, the Princesses turned to leave until Diamond Tiara says something.

"Wait, there is something we need to tell you."

The Princesses looked back on confusion until Spoiled Milk dropped the news

"About the Foals' father... we found him."
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Royal visit part 2

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
"You already found the father?" Twilight blurted out. "Where is he? Let us see him!"
The other princess' looked at Spoiled Rich with interest. Even Flurry Heart stopped playing for a moment to look up.
Spoiled sighed. She could've easily said nothing, letting the tiny human's whereabouts remain a mystery. It would've made her life far less complicated. However, upon thinking about it more she realized that her secret just wouldn't be able to hold up against public scrutiny without doing some. ..distasteful things to him. Better to get it out in the open now rather than later.
Spoiled nodded at her daughter, who took the hint and got up and walked out of the room.
While they waited Spoiled said, "I'm just going to warn you now, what you're about to see may come as a bit of a shock."
Celestia tilted her head, looking at her in confusion. "And just what is so shocking about it"
Spoiled scratched behind her head and chuckled nervously.
"Well you see, it's a funny story..."

At that moment Diamond walked into the room holding a porcelain mug. Now all the princesses looked puzzled. Diamond hoofed over the mug and stepped back, taking a seat on the floor. "This is what you're looking for" Spoiled said, and titled the mug, pouring its only occupant onto her hoof. The little man came alive, surprised by the sudden change in light and began wandering around on her frog. The princesses crowded around close to see to see the strange sight. They all seemed speechless, staring at her hoof with mouths wide open.
Cadance was the first to speak."That's a human? He's so cute!"
"He's also very small. Smaller than even a breezie. It's a good thing we have laws protecting tiny sapient creatures from abuse" Luna added, then looked at Twilight. "Twilight Sparkle, did you know about this?"
Twilight threw up her hooves in defense. "He's definitely not supposed to be that small! All of my research indicated that while they were alive they towered over a pony, even reaching the height of a minotaur and above. The males were larger than the females, and they lived in close-knit family groups."

Celestia scratched her chin in thought. "You said "were", which would seem to imply that they lived once in the past but are now no more."

"That's right!" the young alicorn beamed at her teacher. "We aren't sure what happened, but sometime in the distant past their numbers began to dwindle until there were only a few of them left. Some scholars attributed their disappearance to ponies migrating in and changing their environment. I identified the two babies through the descriptions and detailed drawings I saw in books"

"So, if what all you said is true, then why is he so minuscule?" Cadance asked, wanting to get into the conversation.

"I don't know," Twilight admitted. "Somepony might have put a hex on him causing him to shrink, or he could've wandered into Poison Joke like what happened with my friend Applejack, or any other number of things. I'm going to have to run some tests to figure out what went wrong and maybe try to fix it. Maybe if I..."

"That brings me to my next question," the solar monarch interrupted, seeing that her student was about to go off into a long rambling tangent. "How, exactly did he manage to impregnate these two ponies at his size anyway?"

"I can answer that, your majesty." the dark pink earth pony finally spoke up, breaking her silence. "Diamond and I were, um, "indulging" in each other's company while we were both in heat. My best guess is that the human was present at that time and crawled in each of us to fertilize our eggs, and I guess the rest is history."

"If ponies and humans can interbreed that might mean we can resurrect their species, along with possibly the alicorn tribe." Cadance exclaimed.

Celestia nodded in agreement. "Yes, this is truly a wonderful discovery, and one that needs to be further investigated. I know that you only just found him, but with your permission, I'd like to take him to the Royal Scientific Academy to be studied. I promise you that he would be treated with the utmost respect and care befitting a specimen of his importance. You will be compensated for his time there and will receive regular updates on our progress."
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Royal Visit part 3

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
Spoiled couldn't say no to the princess, not after all the trouble she went to come here, so she nodded her head in acceptance. "Yes,,you can."

Celestia beamed. "Wonderful. I'll just take him and..." Using her magic Celestia picked up the tiny human, who started wiggling around in protest. "Well, now, it looks like he doesn't want to leave." she said, laughing lightly. She handed the tiny to Twilight, who conjured a glass jar to put him in. "I guess with that we'll take out leave." Celestia extended her forelimb and shook Spoiled's hoof. "I'll have him back in your care in no time. Until then!"

Upon watching the princesses file out the room Diamond came up beside her mother to comfort her, nizzling her neck, a gesture that Spoiled returned.
"Do you think he'll be alright?" The filly asked.
Spoiled smiled despite herself and ruffled the mane of her daughter. "I think he will, Diamond. I think he will."


The Princesses left the house, a far cry of the once extravagant mansion Spoiled Milk once owned, it trully shows the change on the once overbearing and arrogant mare turned into a much better pony. Twilight had in her possession glass that contained the Human who continues to fight on against the glass in futility, without much success until he surrenders.

"I think he is tired.." Twilight said as she looks on the glass "Definitely tired." She say as they gotten into the carriage and the Pegasus Guards began to take flight.

"He must have realized that it's futile to continue pounding a glass way thicker that he is," Luna commented. "A glass meant to contain pickles. Cadence stifle a small laugh.

"Aunty, give the human some credit. He's been living like this for how long? Managing to stay incognito for months while looking at his children and the mares he managed to impregnate when he could've escaped from that dangerous place on his perspective." Cadence commented as she rocks Flurry Heart, making her fall to sleep "That takes a lot survivability skill and determination to survive as well seeing his own seed take fruit"

"Then why staying hidden, why revealing himself now?" Luna asks.

"Could be fear." Celestia said, "He did impregnate her and her daughter and for all he knew, she could have reacted negatively and ended his life and none would know, maybe he was taking his chance to interact with them or...that's what he wanted," She say grimly

"Aunty.. How could you say that?" Cadence said, gasping.

"Just think about it, Niece. On that size, everything he experienced so far could nightmarish and knowing that his children were also titanic on sizes that could kill him, interacting with them is impossible, that alone could cause depression so deep that thinking in suicide would've been preferred.."

None said anything but thought on what Celestia had said, it is true, on his size, things could've been really horrible and awful and surviving thus far was a miracle on itself unless he wanted to end it all..

The conversation ended once they reached to Canterlot and onto the Academy, the Princesses explained the situation to the curator of the place and a study group was formed.

Studies were formed and doctors were brought, scientists were hoof-picked and made them recite an oath of secrecy with Twilight being the lead scientists. A lot of tests were made, including both medical and genetic were many discoveries were revealed.

She, along with a group of scientists and medics shrunk to his level to tried to communicate and were met with a varying degree of success but managed to bring some information. From what they managed to bring, while limited, was plentiful to know, he is from another world which confirmed some theories about Humanity's disappearance, he appeared on Spoiled's mansion suddenly and shrunk and sough to escape but failed, he did impregnate them by going as deep into their wombs during their heat period, feeling enthralled by their raging pheromones.

While on his size, they managed to take samples of all kinds, especially blood and sperm samples.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Time at the Academy and tests

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
Winter Star and Holly, two unicorn scientists under Princess Twilight tasked with studying the mysterious new species, or rather old species that was thought to be extinct, were up late one night in a small library in the Research Wing of the RSA, talking about the discovery one of them had made just a few hours prior. Two hot mugs of coffee sat between them, an offering to the Caffeine Goddess to grant them a boon and sustain them through the long night of work.
Winter Star, the senior scientist, was showing her findings to her junior understudy, who was reading through the notes while taking small sips of her coffee.
Winter Star had an intent look on her face, like she expected her colleague to jump out of her seat at the sheer magnitude of her work. Holly, for her part, stayed cool but the implications were starting to excite her nonetheless.
"Hmmm. Yes. Verrrry interesting." she drawled, drawing the older scientist's ire and making her impatient.

"Well, what do you think?" Winter demanded. "Did you like it? The implications for this must be huge, right? We're on the cusp of something big, I can just feel it."

Holly dropped the notes on the table, a frown forming on her face. "I think that you really need to work on your hornwriting. It's so atrocious that I could barely make out what you were trying to say."

Winter Star made a dismissive gesture with her hoof. "That's just the sign of a true genius at work. Starswirl the Bearded had terrible hornwriting and he was one of the greatest sorcerers of all time."

"Is. Is the greatest sorcerer," Holly corrected. "You know he returned from Limbo recently."

"Hmph," Winter huffed, stamping her hoof, "I knew that. I was just testing you. Anyway, even he would be impressed. We're about to rewrite our understanding of the universe, and I, Winter Star, will be right at the forefront."

Holly couldn't help but roll her eyes at the boisterous display. She was reminded of a certain blue unicorn that she went to school with that talked a big game about how smart and powerful she was but ended up dropping out of magic school. One day her colleague and close friend's ego was going to get her into trouble. She tried to change the subject. "What about the sperm samples? she asked, trying to keep the irritation of her voice in check. "What did you learn from those?"
"Oh you know same old, same old. Super potent and compatible with any type of species, blah blah blah."

Holly's mouth dropped open. The other thing sounded important, sure but this one held more immediate applications. "Any type? Are you sure?"

"Sure, I'm sure. Tried it on every type of ovum given to us: Hippogriffs, Seaponies, Changelings, Dragons, Yaks... I think we even had a Kirin in there somehow, You name it, we tried it, and it allll works."

That's... very interesting. This could have some ramifications for the relationships between ponies and other species for certain. Then another thought came to Holly's mind.
"So have we had any luck figuring out the language of the tiny human?"

Winter gave off a frustrated grunt. "If we knew that then we wouldn't have to run so many sun damned tests. I swear shrinking down to attempt to talk to the little ape-man is an exercise in futility. He doesn't recognize any Ponish, written or spoken, and trying to teach him is like trying to fill a sieve. It's so infuriating! "

"You know that creating a hypothesis and then testing it is one of core principles of science." Holly gently reminded trying to soothe her friend's anger. "You've been working hard at this and I know that Princess Sparkle would be proud of you."

"I certainly hope so," Winter replied, having cooled off a little bit. "I'll be going with her tomorrow to the palace to present our findings so far. I'm so nervous! I don't want to disappoint Princess Celestia in front of the whole court."

"You won't," Holly promised, giving her friend a warm smile. "You'll do fine. Just don't do anything rash or stupid or I'll find you and smack you upside the head."

"Gee, thanks," the elder unicorn grumbled, but a small smile touched her face.
"Well, I think we better turn in, then. Wouldn't want you to miss your big date."
Winter agreed, and standing up from her chair, turned off the enchanted lantern lighting the room and walked out with her friend.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Test Results.

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
Winter Star and Holly walked on to the throne room, there was Celestia along with her once Student, Twilight Sparkle, Luna and Cadence were on their own respective domains or duties to attend to.

They saw them coming, the two ponies bowed on the presence of their princesses.

"Rise, My little ponies." Princess Celestia said in a melodious tone. "Drs. Star and Holly, I trust you both got the results from the investigation?"

"Yes, Princess we got the results and they're mixed at best.."

"Mixed?" Twilight inquired both ponies brought papers that report the results.

"We notified and cataloged his species and compared with numerous fossilized bones and tissues we had on ancient humanity, previously thought to be an extinct ape species and we got 96% of accuracy. We're treating with the same species, albeit with a small variation. In short, We have the only pure-blooded human in all Equestria in our hooves, almost literally." Winter Star informed.

"But that's not all, despite the previous attempt we weren't able to translate his language, we only managed to communicate with him using Symbols, Signs, and drawings. Numbers and maths seem to be the only thing we got in common. We gave some him some simple mathematical problems and managed to answer it almost all correctly, then we switched to more advanced where he was more slow to solve but managed to get results, some erroneous but the formulas used were correct. He is intelligent, perhaps average." Holly informed.

"We also got information coming from him based on the signs and drawings, it pictures a different world devoid of magic and only them as the dominant intelligent species using only very advanced technology."

"Wait" Twilight stopped them. "Are you telling me that Humans are not from this world?" She says skeptically.

"Well, several theories had sprung in the light of this information. One that has more sense is humans never went extinct at all and at some point, left through a gateway into another world. Perhaps a different plane of existence or dimension once Ponykind began to settle Equestria Millenia ago."

"Let's say that said theory is true, How he got here or why?" Celestia asks.

"For his Illustration, we managed to piece things together, He doesn't know."

"He... Doesn't know?"

"Yes Princess, at least that's what he picturing us, He was sleeping then upon waking up, he was within the Rich's Mansion within the room of Diamond Tiara. From there we could believe that he went to search more of his peers but bigger but instead, a strong wind push him to the vulva of an early morning Spoiled Rich who was in her heat. Said heat overwhelmed the human's senses and enthralled him to spread his genes and breed by getting into her womb but that's not all, we theorized that he actually fertilized her entire ovary given Spoiled's unnatural pregnancy!"

"Impregnate her... entire ovary?" Both Princesses were shocked to know the answer, Celestia however, was the first to snap up "...Please, Continue."

"Right, after seeding her uterus, he hastily left only to be caught in between on her and her daughter's... "relief" section to pass their heat and fell onto Diamond's fillyhood and the same happened within her except with one of her ova and... that's all." Winter ended.

"That's all? Surely must something else." Twilight asked a bit skeptical but intrigued.

"I know, Princess Sparkle but the Human doesn't want to reveal more. Unfortunately."

"Interesting..." Celestia mused.

"Ther are more?" Twilight asked.

"Yes, his... sperm samples." Holly began unsure how to tell this news.

"Yeah, He is indeed super potent, his swimmers were able to fertilize all form of eggs and ovas donated for this testing.. which was of every species recorded.. even dragons and kirins. In other words, he is able to impregnate any female alive.."

"Any.. female alive? you mean."

"He can crossbreed with anything alive here." Winter continues "Despite the sizes and what we were able to gather, all points to that conclusion, not only that, his sperm contain different proteins different that to stallions which makes this possible. Those proteins and genes while recessive compared to the mothers' could affect certain facet during fertilization and development of the child, on ponies and if we are generous about it, the foals would receive most of the mother's traits including species but they have more chance to develop into other tribes.. including alicorn or switch entirely into the father's species."

Twilight and Celestia had a different reaction, for Twilight she was giddy, this was an exciting discovery a miracle and a breakthrough in the scientific scene, quantum sciences, archeological research and genetic studies but for Celestia...

"Princesses?" Winter Star asked seeing their silence. Celestia for her part asked.

"Is there anything else?"

"Well, yes but we can't give more until further studies."

"I see, You had done a great job in reporting those discoveries to us. Please, continue until you had further information available to us, You may go now" The monarch of the Sun as both doctors bowed and left.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Audience with Princess Celestia

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
"We shall have to inform our allies of this development." Luna commented, "A stud that can spread his seed like that must be worth far more than his weight in gold."

Celestia sighed. "We can't do that yet. We still need to know more about him before we make any big decisions."

Luna snorted derisively. "What more is there to know? His semen is more potent than any other creature alive today. Whoever holds the human, holds the secret to outbreeding their neighbors, providing a powerful bargaining chip in negotiations."

"Or the impetus to start a war to claim such a rare prize." Celestia countered. "We should be patient and continue studying him in secret, until such a time that I'm ready to reveal his existence."

"Remember that our friendship with these nations are still tenuous and fragile. You saw how ready they were to make war when they thought their children had gone missing. How do you think they're going to react when they find out we've been keeping a secret of this magnitude?"

"Not well," Celestia admitted, feeling a little apprehensive about it herself. "Even so, that doesn't mean we should abandon our morals even if it's the smart thing to do. We can't communicate with him and he can't with us, meaning it's impossible to gain his fully educated, informed consent on such an endeavor. Going ahead otherwise with what you're suggesting would be tantamount to rape, not to mention a flagrant disregard for his rights. We would be depriving Spoiled' Milk's children of a father as well."

Luna rolled her eyes. "You and your "rights". Ponies used to do whatever we told them to, and they liked it. He is truly the last of his kind. He needs to breed otherwise his species will die out. We need to find as many breeding partners as we can, which would be best achieved by creating a breeding program and letting him have a go at any creature that wants a try, and when their numbers manage to reach higher than the single digits then we can worry about human rights."

"Maybe there's another way." Twilight suddenly interrupted, causing the arguing sisters to stop and stare at her.
Twilight felt the withering gaze of the two elder princesses and shrank back slightly in her seat, but continued nonetheless.
"Dr. Star mentioned that the human claims to have come from another world where, presumably, there are many more of his kind. If we were to find a way back to where we came from we wouldn't have to solely rely on one human to do the job, and we could possibly create new allies in them as well ."

"We don't even know where to begin to do that." Celestia said. "It's definitely an possibility but I feel like that option won't become available anytime soon. I still say that we should focus on trying to communicate with the human and make him aware of the situation."

"Twilight, you're the tiebreaker here. Who do you agree more with, me or Celestia." Luna asked urgently.

Twilight looked between the faces of the other two princesses and sighed. They weren't going to make this wasy, were they? Finally, after a few minutes of thinking and mental turmoil Twilight came to a decision.
"I... agree with..."
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Emergency meeting

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
"Celestia is right, Luna-"

"I should've known that the student would support her teacher." Luna sighed

"No wait, hear me out first. Celestia is right on one thing, We should at least try to make a way to communicate with him aside of drawings and illustrations and have his consent or at least be aware of his importance and the situation he is in." Twilight began "THEN we can make the breeding program in effect and notify our allies.."

"Fine, we'll keep this on the secret but we have to be quick about it..." Luna said

"Thank you, both of you.." Celestia said with a smile causing the little Alicorn to do so too, Luna for her part didn't but trusted Celestia Judgement to not mess this up, after all, Equestria still exist after one thousand years without her.

But that could change if this isn't handled accordingly.
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Celestia

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
To say that Winter Star was nervous would be a grave understatement. She already felt that she completely flopped on giving her report and now the princess was summoning her for a private meeting. Like many ponies, she abhorred the idea of disappointing the princess, who was like a mother to her nation and all the little ponies surrounding her. She'd heard tales of ponies going to extreme measures to avoid doing so, even engaging in self harm. She wasn't that crazy but she felt a knot her throat forming as she approached the door to the private study that refused to go away. After a moment of trepidation she knocked three times on the stained wood, prompting a swift "enter."

Not wasting any time Winter opened the door and stepped inside.
Princess Celestia was at her desk looking at her paperwork, then smiled as she looked up and noticed Winter.
"Ah, Dr. Star. I'm so glad you could come. Please, take a seat."

Winter pulled out a chair and hopped up into it, trying her best not to fidget too much as the princess talked.

"Now, I'll not waste your time and get right to the point. Time is of the essence. First of all, I'd like to congratulate you on your work and tell you you're doing a great service to Equestria by spending time on this project."

Winter smiled and bowed her head. "Of course, thank you your highness."

"However... there i still much to learn and I fear that you'll have to suspend your other projects to work on this full-time. We don't know how or why this human came here and where he came from, why he's so small, why his sperm is so potent, and we can not gain his informed consent to conduct any more invasive experiments because of a language barrier, a barrier that we are incapable of overcoming with magic. My sister wishes to enroll him in a breeding program to repopulate the human race, which I can not in good conscience allow without his consent. That's why I called you here today, to figure out a way around this problem.

Winter gained a thoughtful look, rubbing her chin. "What do you expect me to do, your highness?"

Celestia crossed her forehooves on the table and leaned closer. "You've spent a lot of time with the human, meaning that above all other ponies at the Academy you are the one he's most familiar with. He is our guest, which means that his safety and comfort are our top priority. I feel that that you might have better luck if he were to remain in Ponyville with his family while we run further tests. While he's there you will accompany him and continue your work, coordinating with Twilight if necessary. Remember that we want to avoid any undue stress so I'd say an hour a day would be appropriate. Take as much time as you need, and send me a report on your progress every week. Write me immediately if he makes any mention of other worlds. Do you understand?"

"Yes your highness," Winter said, breathing an internal sigh of relief.

"Alright, that's about all, I think You are dismissed." Celestia said, before breaking eye contact and returning to her papers.
Winter bowed her head and got up to leave, feeling both excited and nervous at what the future may hold.
Celestia watched her leave, gently tapping a forehoof against her desk
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: A special request

1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
The return of human back to the family happened two days after Celestia made Winter Star the main researcher for the project that would lead a more understatement of the Human Race. Winter rented a house near the Milk and Tiara's very own home and often visited them to make or at least try to interview the human or just watch him interact with his surroundings and take notes

And the following days have been trying to communicate with the Tiny Human in different ways, just like before, there hasn't been any success in trying to make until...

There has been a Breakthrough.

Turns out that the Human's Language was pretty similar to the Griffin's ancient language, The syntax, and similar letter composition and even some words that the human spoke were fairly similar, how come she has never seen this before? Then again, He was good on math which suggested that Human numerical system is virtually similar to Equestrian.

Now, while this was a huge discovery, the language was still different, some of the words didn't add out and were fairly confusing but it was a start.

Upon showing the human, He muttered the word "Latin" and "Roman". What are those words? what does it mean? anyway, she sends the letter to Princess Celestia which in return sent her documents detailing ancient griffins' language during and after the expansion of the first Griffin Empire. She was instructed to decipher his language.

Winter Star sighed "And so the most tedious part begins, Hopefully, this is easier than it looks."
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.title: Next

choices: She wants to talk to Winter about adding her to the family
She's wondering if that's a good idea
1353222111111111211122211111131111111111.content:
"No, no. This is all wrong. Let's try again. Say it with me, apple,apple.
Winter Star was sitting on Spoiled couch, overlooking a coffee table where a makeshift illusory classroom had been set up, complete with a miniature blackboard.
Seated in a tiny desk made specially for such a purpose was the tiny human, who she had just spent a grueling 3 weeks with trying to break through into his world.
The evolution of the verbal pathways leading to his language was a long and twisted one, full of meaningless branching pathways and dead ends, and it was starting to make her want to make her tear her mane out.
His language, in short, made absolutely no sense.

Never mind trying to translate anything that he says into workable modern Griffish, let alone Ponish!
She might have better luck trying to teach the pony language to the human rather than the other way around.
He was obviously highly intelligent, the drawings he made in regards to his home had been invaluable in achieving a greater understanding of the world he comes from, but it wasn't enough.
She needed to hear what he had to say with his own words, right from the horse's mouth, pardoning the expression.

At least the human seemed frustrated by the slow process as well, and it wasn't for lack of trying that her teachings had been such a failure so far., the human
The two species were just too different to interact without great difficulty.
The most baffling thing was that their alphabet and phonetics seemed so simple, with 26 symbols compared to Ponish's 48.
Only a truly clever species could make such a complex language out of so small a number of letters.

info.brief_description: You find yourself trapped in Equestria with some very large ponies.
info.description:
In this story, you're dropped into Equestria without warning, where everything is huge and alien and the only things you have with you are your wits and the clothes on your back. Navigate through obstacles and avoid getting crushed or eaten as you attempt to survive in this harsh, alien land.
